Who We Are

Scarlett House Food Group is an experienced and superior full-service catering and boutique food manufacturing company with a proven track record for outstanding personalized service and immaculate attention to detail. Our services can be further divided into two main divisions: Contract Services and In-House Solutions.

Our Contract Services division is where we develop and produce ready to eat meals in mid to high volumes for leading Canadian airline corporations, transportation service providers, healthcare and correctional institutions, grocery and convenience stores, and many other retail outlets nation-wide. Our co-packing and private-labeling services allow our clients the ability to continue focusing on growing their brand while we produce and deliver products to the exact requirements and specifications. We are proud to be apart of a network of caterers from across the country to provide services to all clients on a larger scope. We produce a wide variety of products which includes everything from snack boxes, sandwiches and wraps to daily, hot, fresh or frozen meals.

Our roots came from our long-time experience with In-House Solutions where we operate corporate cafés and provide exclusive event catering services to destination venues throughout Ontario and specifically the GTA region. This division is where our creativity truly comes to life and has pushed us to continue improving and growing our potential offerings in our Contract Services division.

With the vision of nation-wide services, Scarlett House Atlantic Division Inc. opened its doors to act as a mirror operation to all our capabilities. Our Atlantic Division in Nova Scotia works closely with our Ontario head office team to offer indistinguishable services that highlight East Coast cuisine.

About us

Food service packaging

At Serva, we take the time to understand your particular food service packaging needs by providing a wide selection of high-quality options to elevate your patron's dining, takeout, storage, and other requirements.

 

Between advertising your unique brand and finding the custom solution for your startup food truck, we have a food service packaging answer for you! If you do not see precisely what you are looking for, be sure to contact our expert team to discuss a new design or innovation. We are always looking to expand our offerings.

Our products

Private label packaging

Serva is proud to offer private label servicing of all our various food service packaging products to clients of all sizes. You specify the needs of your business, how the packaging should look, and what features need to be included, and we handle the rest. 

 

Our experienced team works with national brands, importers, and retailers alike, providing private label packaging that increases your market share.

Learn more

Custom packaging

We work with all kinds of clients to create custom lines of packaging options specifically for that brand. We are happy to discuss any of these needs with your team and love the challenge of finding new solutions for your food, drink, or business requirements.

Part of this dedication to being one of the best is offering custom order sizes that fit the specific challenges of your restaurant, business, grocer, food truck, café, and more.

TDS Technologies
Specializes in the design, fabrication and installation of industrial manufacturing and processing equipment.

Our experience crosses many industries, although the bulk of our equipment falls into the following categories: Lumber Spray Systems, Food Manufacturing Equipment and Material Handling/Automation Systems.

​TDS Technologies was first established in 1986 as an amalgamation of three companies: Trendset Machinery, Delco Electric and Spraytec. The goal was to provide excellent engineer​in​g, fabrication and machining services all in one facility.

Over the years we've cultivated a great reputation for providing high quality ​​product line systems, in addition to creative​ custom solutions and confidential and exclusive prototype development​.​

We Design & Engineer the Buildings that Make Food

Our clients make delicious products.
We craft their facilities.

See Our Areas of Expertise

Be Inspired by Food Lovers Like You

Food is not a sideline: it’s what we do. IFAB works exclusively in the food and beverage industry, helping businesses like yours grow every day.

Our in-house team of project managers, designers, and engineers are hand-selected to meet the food and beverage sector’s high production output and hygienic requirements. We are full of experience — but hungry for a challenge.

Learn About IFAB

There Is a Better Way

Unlock the maximum potential of your current investment or create a plan to increase your return on a future project.

When you decide to expand, renovate, or start fresh, we will help you align near-term expenditures with long-term goals.

Start Planning

Go from Concept to Completion with Engineering Consultants Who Only Build Facilities for Food

Save time by connecting with experts in the food and beverage sector who are experienced with stringent hygienic design requirements.

From building large industrial complexes to reimagining small interior renovations, we provide the range of in-house engineering and consulting services you need. You can move quickly with our team.

Learn More

Our Process for Food Factory Designs and Renovations
Project Definition

Take your great idea and make it a reality. We will guide you in determining your project’s capital investment and how long it will take to implement.

Detailed Design

Exceptional engineers and designers will design your facility to withstand the rigours of food processing and meet or exceed the regulatory demands. Our long-term planning will ensure that your investment today can be adapted for growth tomorrow.

Procurement

Building from our years of experience in the food industry, we have refined procurement processes that result in clear contracts with suppliers and contractors. Our team will identify a list of local, regional, and national contractors, pre-qualify and engage them to bring you the most competitive bids.

Construction Management

The provision of on-site project management is available for any client who wants daily monitoring of the project’s scope, schedule, and budget.

CQV and Start-Up

A formalized approach to commissioning, qualification, and verification (CQV) will ensure a safe and accelerated start-up curve for your project. Our dedicated CQV team, consisting of multi-disciplinary representatives, will work with you to establish success criteria.

Your Partner in food Business Excellence

A leading mentoring, coaching, learning, and auditing resource with its prime focus on “food business excellence”. We endeavor to nurture food safety cultural mindset through “TQM – total quality” approach and promote a food business environment that ensures first time quality.

Our Mission

Our Mission is to effectively serve the diversified and ever-changing demands of contemporary food business operations to accomplish Business Excellence through Food Vision’s EDGE.

Our Zones of Strength

FV Pro Learn

Why Food Vision ?

Food Vision (since 2000) Inc. is a premium mentoring, coaching, learning, and auditing resource that offers one stop solution for food business excellence. At the heart of our company lies an abiding passion for cutting-edge cuisine and service excellence. With years of experience and expertise, our planning team captures your vision and creates immersive experiences. We believe that great food is the foundation of any memorable event. That's why we go above and beyond to create exceptional culinary experiences that leave a lasting impression. Our team of chefs is dedicated to sourcing the finest ingredients and crafting dishes that are as beautiful as they are delicious. Whether you're planning an intimate gathering or grand celebration, you can trust Edge Catering to deliver an unforgettable dining experience.

MEET THE TEAM

“My partner and I recently had the pleasure of working with Amanda and the Edge team. They provided bar and buffet service for our wedding reception. The experience was fantastic! Amanda supported us early on with menu planning, venue layout, and supported our event ideas like welcoming all of our guests with sparkling wine as they entered the rooftop patio for cocktail hour. We did a tasting of our menu a couple of months before the party and Edge was accommodating to tweak the menu. The bar service was equally impressive, with skilled and friendly bartenders crafting our delicious “his and hers” cocktails and providing attentive service. Overall, this caterer's outstanding attention to detail, and wonderful food (the chimichurri sauce was especially a hit!) made our wedding reception truly memorable. I wholeheartedly recommend Edge for a memorable wedding caterer.”

“Edge's team always does a fantastic job - whether catering a large event or doing takeaway lunches for my office, we love working with them. They are a wonderful, women-lead team with delicious food and plenty flexibility!”

“Edge Catering did my wedding at the Polygon Gallery …. I cannot recommend them enough! I initially chose them because of the many different options they offer for different dietary restrictions. We did a tasting which they made so fun (highly recommend this experience). Gemma was incredibly helpful and responsive from start to finish. The food was absolute perfection and to top it off, their staff is so lovely. We received so many comments from our guests on how positive and happy their staff were throughout the wedding. This really added to an already great experience. I would hire them again in a heartbeat!”

“We received unsolicited feedback from almost every guest at our wedding saying how amazing the food was. Typically wedding food is never great, but the fact that so many of our guests came up to us to tell us how great the food was speaks wonders. We didn't have to ask anyone how their meals were, as we were told before we could even ask. This alone should tell you to book your catering events with Edge! On top of that, the service the staff provided was the best I have ever seen. They were professional, friendly, and incredibly customer service focused. We were so lucky that Edge Catering was available for our wedding weekend. We were working with Amanda and she was able to quickly respond to all of our questions, make changes based on our requests, and provided us with many options to choose from. We had a lot of dietary restrictions which Amanda and team handled without any issues. Edge also catered our rehearsal dinner buffet, where they dropped off the food and catering items and picked them up later. The food was great, setup was smooth and efficient, and the team was amazing. 

THANK YOU Amanda and the Edge Catering team! There is no one else we will work with in the future and we 100% recommend for anyone to work with you.”

“I need more than 5 stars!!! From the staff to the food - everything was exceptional. We received SO many compliments on our plated meals, and signature cocktails. Gemma was such a pleasure to work with, she was so sweet, very accommodating and responded quickly to our questions. The plates during our tasting blew us away, and even more so on our wedding day. We cannot thank Edge enough and would recommend them to anyone looking for quality, creativity, and delicious meals!”

“I recently had the pleasure of working with Gemma, Steven, Chef and owner Judy on a complex wedding and I can't say enough good things! With just a little over two weeks from the event date I contracted them with a complicated request and they immediately came to the rescue. From providing a prompt quote to offering to do a site visit just a few days after my initial inquiry, to turning around a beautifully designed menu, they were nothing but outstanding. On the event day its self, they went above and beyond to ensure everything was absolutely perfection and would not settle for anything less. Their entire team worked so well together, did what ever was needed, providing a wonderful environment to work within, even with the short turn around. I was so happy and so were my clients. Thank you so much for all that you did, I really appreciated it!.”

“Edge Catering was one of the highlights of our daughter's wedding end of October. The team, lead by Judy and Steven, were so easy to work with, came up with fantastic solutions to a challenging outdoor setting, and served amazing food! Everything was cooked and served to perfection. So glad we made the choice to have Edge as the caterers!”

Canada’s Wholesale Health Food Supplier
LCG Foods Distribution

At LCG Foods, we connect innovative food brand owners and retailers who have a shared desire to do good for each other, and for the planet. We source the best foods in the world and bring them to markets where the gift of wholesome, natural, and nutritious food can be shared by individuals, families, and communities across Canada.

Our goal as your supplier is to provide your business with unique, health-conscious product lines that help you stand out from competitors. We provide the healthy products your customers are asking for, before you know they’re looking for them. We are not just a supplier - we’re your strategic partner that’s here to grow your business and to help you differentiate yourself from regular supermarkets and their growing health food selection. To that end, we continuously source health food products that are unique, yet easily understood by your target customers.

We stand with food innovators who dare to challenge "big food". We stand with retailers who want better products on their shelves - and in the process, turn their customers into raving, loyal fans.

We endeavor to do all this as efficiently as possible - while minimizing waste, taking care of our employees, our customers, and partners. We make a positive impact on people, communities, and the planet.

We are a proud strategic supplier for hundreds of independent grocers, health food stores, specialty retailers, and restaurants located across Canada including Vancouver, Calgary, Winnipeg, Toronto, Montreal, St. John’s and smaller communities in-between.

DESIGN & SUPPLY PROJECTS

Explore Project Gallery

 
Membership Club
CLUB VERSANTE

Club Versante is an upscale membership-based club that facilitates exceptional culinary and leisurely experiences. As of 2023, CRS has completed four restaurant kitchens and 7 kitchen designs. The fifth kitchen is opening this year, and the other kitchens will open next year. The project started in 2017 and has had 5 different executive chefs CRS had to remain agile and creative in order to meet the needs of each restaurant.

Read more

 
Care home
SUMMERWOOD RETIREMENT RESIDENCE

CRS has built six Summerwood retirement locations. Whenever working with a care home, CRS needs to focus on the resident dynamic, like how many rooms the home holds or kitchen size.

 
Restaurant
EDO JAPAN

CRS has built over 100 of Edo Japan’s locations.

The design of each location must follow the brand standards and utilize the required equipment.

When supply chain issues struck globally, CRS’s restaurant kitchen designers worked closely with the operations team at Edo to simplify the design.

 
Restaurant
PENTICTON LAKESIDE RESORT

This resort currently has two restaurants and one banquet kitchen, with a pub soon to come.

Foodservice in the Okanagan can, understandably, get hot.

Understanding the unique challenges of the climate in Penticton coupled with industry know-how, CRS was able to provide an innovative commercial kitchen equipment solution to a burning problem: heat.

CUSTOMER SERVICE(Amazing and à la carte)

IS EMC RIGHT FOR ME?

EMC has grown to become Canada's largest manufacturing consortium and, with hundreds of industry events annually, is one of the most active manufacturing organizations in North America! Offering industry expertise in the areas of productivity, quality, purchasing, supply chain, energy, health & safety, continuous improvement, operations, human resources and much more, EMC’s ecosystem supports the entire Canadian manufacturing sector.

MEET EMC
UPCOMING EVENTS

EMC is passionate about the power of people. We host hundreds of events across the country connecting manufacturers in search of insight on specific topics, looking to network with other members, and connecting with industry thought leaders. Members can attend Strategic Interest Groups (SIGs), Peer-to-peer Networking, and more. Industry events are open to the public. View upcoming events, RSVP, and stay current on industry news.

Welcome to CFS - Where Personalized Service Meets Culinary Excellence!

At Commercial Food Service Inc. (CFS), we don't just provide food service solutions; we create lasting relationships. Welcome to a space where the warmth of our service is as exceptional as the flavors we bring to your kitchen.

Why Choose CFS?

Unmatched Culinary Excellence: Indulge in a culinary journey like no other. Our locally sourced, high-quality products reflect the vibrant flavors of our community, making every meal an experience worth savoring.

Meet Our Exceptional Team: Behind every delicious dish is a team of passionate individuals dedicated to perfection. Explore our staff profiles to get to know the faces that make CFS the heart💚of culinary innovation in the city.

Your Personal Culinary Partner: At CFS, we believe in more than just transactions; we believe in connections. Our commitment to personalized service means getting to know you, your preferences, and how we can tailor our offerings to make every culinary experience uniquely yours.

Community-Focused: We're not just a local company; we're an integral part of the Greater Edmonton community. Our Christmas food hampers, community engagement, and support for local businesses are testaments to our commitment to making a positive impact.

Hassle-Free and Friendly: Our approach to service is casual, friendly, and above all, hassle-free. Whether you're a long-time customer or just getting to know us, expect a welcoming atmosphere where your satisfaction is our top priority.

Join us at CFS, where we blend the best of culinary expertise with a personalized touch that goes beyond the ordinary. Discover a world of flavor, community, and exceptional service right at your fingertips.

Ready to embark on a culinary adventure? Explore our website, get to know our team, and stay tuned for exciting updates. At CFS, we're not just serving food; we're creating memories.

 

Why go with CFS?

It's easy to place an order with CFS! Just send us an email at orders@commercial-food.com to place an order and find out when we can deliver to you.

What Makes Us Special
Rigorous Quality Assurance and testing processes for delicious and trusted sport nutrition products.

Fit Foods Ltd is a Canadian company and a world-class manufacturer of sports nutrition and healthy-living powder supplements. We apply our founding principles of promoting healthier, happier lives to everything we do. This means we bring our very best practices and processes so that our consumers can be confident when they purchase our brands. We are proud of bringing superior taste and cutting-edge formulations to over 80 countries around the world. By using high-quality ingredients and products we can ensure that ever product delivers on its promise and is delicious to consume.

Join Our Team.
View Careers
Our Team

Our great culture facilitates cross-functional work and enlivening problem solving. Learn more about how our teams inspire the best work.

Manufacturing

Every scoop matters. Our manufacturing team combines scientific precision with genuine care, crafting premium sports supplements in our state-of-the-art facilities. We're proud to create products that help athletes and fitness enthusiasts reach their full potential.

Distribution

When you're committed to your fitness goals, timing is everything. Our distribution team ensures your supplements arrive fresh and ready when you need them. We treat every package as if it's going to our own training partner, because in a way, it is.

Research & Development

Passion meets science in our R&D lab. This dedicated team of sports nutrition experts and researchers works tirelessly to develop supplements that truly deliver. We believe everyone deserves access to effective, science-backed formulas that support their fitness journey.

Sales

Our sales team doesn't just know our products—they live the fitness lifestyle. As active members of the fitness community, they understand your goals and challenges firsthand. Count on them to help you find the right supplements for your personal journey, because your success is our success.

Marketing

The fitness journey is personal, and our marketing team gets it. They're the storytellers who share real success stories from our community and spread our message of accessible, science-backed nutrition. Because everyone deserves to feel confident in their supplement choices.

People & Culture

Walk through our doors and you'll feel it—a culture where wellness isn't just what we sell, it's how we live. Our People & Culture team nurtures an environment where team members thrive, grow, and support each other.

Power Your Fitness Journey.

We Bring Transparency to The Table

Through research, data, and educational content, we help food services reduce their climate impact through a climate labelling system. We calculate the carbon intensity of each menu item and communicate it through in-store labels with the mission to empower consumers to make more sustainable and informed food choices.

Our mission is to integrate the climate into our everyday food choices.

The global food system is a major contributor to climate change, responsible for up to a quarter of global greenhouse gas emissions . That is why our food choices matter when it comes to reducing global emissions. We envision a world where we produce, consume and compost food in a sustainable manner. By reducing our collective footprint, we will create a more sustainable food system & healthier future.

Impact of Food Choices on the Climate

Food production accounts for over a quarter of global greenhouse gas emissions, and half of the world’s habitable (ice and desert-free) land is used for agriculture. The urgency of the climate crisis and the significant impact that food has on greenhouse gas emissions means that food services and consumers have an important role to play in their food choices, by creating demand for less carbon-intensive foods. By providing transparency on the carbon emissions of food by using menu labels, consumers will be able to make more climate-informed choices. A 2020 survey found that consumers were in support of carbon labelling on products across all countries, with two-thirds of consumers saying they think it is a good idea (The Carbon Trust, 2020).

We believe the value of carbon labelling can extend to restaurant menus too. Our vision is that the resulting shift in demand away from carbon-intensive foods will lead to food services offering more low-carbon alternatives. Other restaurants around the world are starting to put climate labels on their food, such as Chipotle and Just Salad. Now is the perfect time to get ahead!

Importance of Sustainability in Business

Incorporating sustainability into your business model isn’t only great for the environment - it is also becoming widely accepted as a necessity for long-term business success. Today’s consumer wants to know where their food comes from, how it was produced, and, increasingly, what sustainability factors were included in the process. According to the Nielsen Company , 74% of Millennials and 72% of Gen-Z consumers are willing to pay more for sustainable products and services.

By implementing climate labels, we can help your business turn sustainability into a viable brand strategy for more sustainability-minded audiences, increasing your presence in the community, and improving long-term sales. With sufficient foresight, these can become opportunities to lead by example and become trend setters in the industry. Responding to heightened social, governmental, and consumer attention on the broader impact of the environment nowadays demonstrates how a more sustainable business model is a competitive advantage. It’s a win-win for you, our community, and for the environment.

ANYTIME. ANYWHERE.

We design, supply, construct, and operate workforce accommodations in any location.

With LandSea, you can set up camp anywhere. Combining a balance of extreme creativity, problem solving, and industry-leading skill and experience, we create practical comfort in any location.

We believe people deserve a good place to live, regardless of where their job takes them. That’s why we go beyond basic provision of food and shelter, so that on-site workers remain healthy, happy, and at their most productive.

Accommodation Solutions

Whether your project requires land-based modular or floating accommodation, we specialize in the design, planning, supply, installation, and operation of turn-key workforce lodging solutions.

Land-Based 

With standard configurations to accommodate 2 to 600 guests, our modular housing options are scalable and flexible, with a variety of facilities and support services to meet your projects needs.

Floating 

Our floating accommodation solutions include a fleet of facilities ranging in size from 10 to 300+ single occupancy rooms, offering every amenity and support system you would find on land.

ROOTED IN HISTORY + POWERED BY INNOVATION
Exciting News:
DRSS Ottawa Joins RGH!

We are excited to announce a new partnership effective Nov 1st, 2024.

DRSS Ottawa Commercial Kitchen Services has merged with Choquette CKS. Under this new strategic partnership, the organization will continue to provide first-in-class service to all our customer partners in the Eastern Ontario region, with the same technician and administrative staff you have come to know over many years. DRSS and Choquette CKS will operate under the RGH brand effective immediately, as a division of Heritage Food Service Group Canada. The RGH name has been established in the Greater Toronto Area and Southwestern Ontario regions for well over 100 years, and this opportunity allows us to align our Ontario team members under one name throughout the province. The same great team you know, look forward to servicing you as RGH - Eastern Ontario.

LEARN MORE ⟶
RGH's Commitment:
Expertise & Excellence in Every Repair

We are here to serve businesses in Toronto and the GTA with our local, quality-trained technicians who bring a wealth of tenure and experience to our customers.

 

We offer top-notch equipment service, expert advice, and a wide range of OEM parts. At RGH, we are more than a service provider, we are your dedicated maintenance partners working every day to keep your business thriving.

LEARN MORE ⟶
SERVING THE GREATER TORONTO AREA

Serving London, Windsor, the Niagara Region

and the Greater Toronto Area.

FIND A LOCATION NEAR YOU ⟶
WHAT WE DO

RGH is the leading provider of commercial kitchen equipment repair and maintenance in Ontario, proudly serving businesses in Toronto, London and beyond.

​

Our expert technicians offer a comprehensive suite of services, including emergency repairs, planned maintenance, and genuine OEM parts replacement, ensuring your kitchen operates smoothly and efficiently. With over 120 years of experience, we specialize in a full range of equipment care for restaurants, educational institutions, and healthcare facilities, delivering fast, reliable service that's just a call away. Trust us to keep your kitchen at peak performance, wherever you are in the Greater Toronto area.

LEARN MORE ⟶
WE CARE BEYOND SERVICE
OUR PROMISE + COMMITMENT

Our commitment to timing and convenience ensures that your operations face minimal disruptions. With our OEM-trained technicians, we not only respond swiftly when you need us, but we also ensure the job is done right the first time, every time.

 

Your operational efficiency is our top priority, and our extensive experience means we're equipped to deliver excellence with every service call. We're always just a call away, ready to serve and ensure your kitchen runs at its best when you need it most.

Explore Our Services

Good people making good coffee.

Brazilian Canadian Coffee Co. was established in 1975 and has been dedicated to crafting the highest quality gourmet coffees ever since. It has always been our philosophy that an educated customer is the best customer. We emphasize creating lasting relationships, helping you learn about coffee, and providing incredible education on the processes behind it.

We were founded and built upon the food service industry.

Driven by a passion for coffee, quality and service, Jack Kyriazakos knew that the only way to provide the best of all three would be by crafting a perfect roast with characteristics as distinct as his own. Founded in 1975, the Brazilian Canadian Coffee company now operates as a large distributor that produces a wide selection of consistent, quality-ensured coffees.

THE ZF ADVENTURE

ZF AMERICA® and ZF MAX® are your leading manufacturers, importers, and exporters of quality seafood products. Our Story
Support

Guaranteeing that products are safe, of superior quality, have accurate labeling, sizing and are 100% net weight every time.

Simplicity

Reliability

Setting the highest standards for quality seafood and offering a variety of innovative and versatile products for all culinary experiences. We will supply you quality seafood in a reliable and consistent manner, every time

About
We repurpose and recycle materials from the animal agriculture and food industries – transforming them into essential ingredients that do everything from feeding animals to fertilizing crops to fueling planes and nourishing people.
About
Our story
Management
Contact
Solutions
As a world leader in circularity, we transform materials from the animal agriculture and food industries into valuable ingredients. Ingredients that nourish people, feed animals and crops, and fuel the world with renewable energy. This is supported through three segments within our operations: Feed, Food and Fuel.
Solutions
Feed
Essential ingredients for animal nutrition, fertilizers and renewable fuels.
Food
Ingredients to enhance human health and wellbeing.
Fuel
Powering the future with low-emission energy solutions.
Brands
Our brands span more than 260 facilities across the world, transforming more than 16 million metric tons of raw material into over 350 sustainable ingredients every year.

Sustainable solutions for used cooking oil and meat by-product disposal

Darling Ingredients Canada provides the restaurant and food processing industry with sustainable solutions for used cooking oil and meat by-product disposal.

Sustainable solutions for used cooking oil and meat by-product disposal

Darling Ingredients Canada provides the restaurant and food processing industry with sustainable solutions for used cooking oil and meat by-product disposal.

Services
Process
Solutions
Careers
Contact
A dependable partner for food industry businesses
Our purpose is to repurpose. We take pride in building a bridge between industries and making food production more sustainable. Through our services for restaurants, groceries, farms, and processing plants, we make recycling convenient, create new high-value products, and enable a circular industry. Our vital and environmentally-safe solutions help protect the food and feed chains, while benefiting people, businesses and the environment. 
Our services
Used cooking oil collection
Used cooking oil systems
Meat by-products collection
Used cooking oil collection

Our service professionals offer solutions for storage, collection and recycling of used cooking oil to help safely and efficiently manage grease. Our mission is to make the used cooking oil collection process as simple and unobtrusive as possible.

 

How it works:

We deliver a grease container to fit every customer's needs. 
Service is auto scheduled with frequency based on tank capacity and volume of used cooking oil.
Contactless Grease Removal: In-house technicians extract oil without entering the building and require zero employee interaction.
Material is repurposed locally at one of our biosecure processing plants.
The majority of used cooking oil is recycled and used in the production of clean-burning biofuels.
Need a pick up? Looking to set up service?
Used cooking oil systems

We offer a variety of used oil tanks to fit most any kitchen space. Our in-house team of professionals complete an onsite or virtual survey of the back of house to determine which system best fits the kitchen, used cooking oil disposal volume and collection needs.

 

Getting started is as easy as 1-2-3:

Step 1: Find the fit with a simple site survey
Step 2: Install — Our team manages the ordering, delivery and installation of the new tank. Most fryers are equipped with a waste oil disposal port. Which means our direct pump connection transfers oil by flipping a lever or pushing a button. If direct pump is not an option at this time, both our Pump Station and Grease Caddy provide a safe, semi-automated alternative.
Step 3: Training — Operation is simple. We train kitchen employees on how to use the equipment and each tank includes a QR code to quickly access tank specs, "how to" guides and videos online.
Looking to have a tank installed in your kitchen?
Meat by-products collection

Our full-service partnership includes containment, collection and recycling of inedible meat by-products, whether a site produces 250kg or 250MT of material a day. We collect an assortment of meat-based waste, including bone and fat trimmings from butcher shops or packing plants, expired or excess meat from supermarkets, animal by-products from large scale industrial processing facilities, or fallen stock from livestock producers.

 

How it works:

We deliver the right storage containers. Whether it is a wheeled cart, plastic combo or placing an empty trailer, we've got every customer covered.
Service is set up on a dedicated schedule to collect and recycle time sensitive meat by-products.
Licensed professionals use specialized, state-of-the-art equipment for quick and efficient removal.
Technicians ensure a clean and sanitary transfer of material from store to processing facility.
Material is handled responsibly, in accordance with federal and provincial regulations.
We supply an itemized invoice of services and full traceability of material collected.
Ready to learn more?
How we do it

Our process

Collection

We provide reliable collection, rendering and recycling services for animal, food production and restaurants in Canada. We maintain a dedicated fleet of trucks that safely and efficiently deliver these materials to one of our facilities for processing, diverting this material from landfill and composting.

 

Processing

Through a cooking process, we separate the raw material into fats, proteins and water, treating and returning more water back to the environment than we use.

 

Finished ingredients

Fats and proteins provide valuable, safe, nutritious ingredients to animal feed and petfood manufacturers, and nutrient-rich ingredients for fertilizers. A large portion of our animal fats are used as a low-carbon feedstock for renewable diesel and aviation fuel production. We produce a complete line of animal-based proteins, including chicken meal, chicken by-product meal, poultry by-product meal, turkey by-product meal, hydrolyzed feather meal, blood meal, meat and bone meal and pork meal.

Contact us to learn more about our products and process.
Eco-friendly solutions
Innovative used cooking oil storage solutions

When signing up for service, customers will receive one of our state-of-the-art used grease containers. With over 25 years of experience in manufacturing containers and a diverse line-up of tanks, our solutions are designed to fit almost any kitchen space.

Cleanstar® GRN | our shortest model, at just over five feet tall, offers a compact high performing design making it perfect for spaces with limited room or low ceilings. This model features a control panel with "full" shut off and heater so you can operate it at just the right time and temperature. Size 64" h/ 30" w / 30"d; capacity: 612 kg/ 681 L

1
of 7

Benefits
Why automated collection equipment?
Improved cleanliness
Enclosed design reduces spills and stains, while also minimizing pests and odors.
Save on labour
One-touch transfer means not carrying oil to an outdoor bin.
Reduce injury
Hands-free process eliminates contact with hot oil.
Prevent theft
Patented tank technology deters theft of cooking oil, safeguarding employees.
Oil transfer options
A solution for every kitchen

Fully automated, direct pump connection | Many modern fryers with built-in filtration feature a ‘waste oil disposal’ port. We install a secure connection from this disposal port to our tank. This fully enclosed system ensures a reliable and controlled method for transferring oil to a UCO container, reducing human error and minimizing the risk of accidents.

ABOUT US

Welcome to Ideal Food Service Corp.

Our warehousing and truck fleet are managed in-house ensuring that our clients receive prompt delivery, from our warehouse to their doors.

Conseils pour gérer la frénésie des fêtes de fin d'année dans votre cuisine.
Les fêtes de fin d'année sont là, et avec elles, l'agitation des cuisines, les commandes qui débordent et les délais très courts. Chez Ideal Service Alimentaire, nous comprenons la pression qui accompagne le bon fonctionnement de votre cuisine pendant cette période chargée. C'est la raison pour laquelle nous sommes là pour vous aider à chaque étape du processus avec des livraisons fiables, des conseils d'experts et les bons produits pour vous faire gagner du temps et maximiser l'efficacité. Voici quelques conseils pour garder votre cuisine sur les rails et comment nous pouvons vous aider : 1. Planifiez À l’Avance avec une Bonne Gestion des Stocks Tomber à court d’ingrédients clés au pire moment est le cauchemar de tout chef. Évitez les surprises en faisant le point sur vos stocks dès maintenant et en identifiant les produits les plus demandés pour la saison. Comment Nous Pouvons Vous Aider : Notre équipe de vente est prête à vous aider à prévoir vos besoins et à planifier vos commandes. Avec notre catalogue de produits complet et nos mises à jour en temps réel sur les stocks, nous veillerons à ce que vous disposiez de tout le nécessaire pour répondre à la demande de vos clients. 2. Optimisez Vos Commandes pour Plus d’Efficacité Gagnez du temps et réduisez le stress en regroupant vos commandes et en faisant le plein d’ingrédients polyvalents et de qualité. Les bons produits peuvent simplifier la préparation des repas et vous aider à préparer vos plats plus rapidement. Comment Nous Pouvons Vous Aider : Ideal Service Alimentaire propose une gamme de produits pratiques conçus pour améliorer l’efficacité de votre cuisine. Des ingrédients préparés aux solutions prêtes à l’emploi, nous avons tout ce qu’il vous faut pour rationaliser vos opérations. 3. Comptez sur des Livraisons Fiables et Ponctuelles Lorsque l’emploi du temps de votre cuisine est chronométré à la minute près, chaque livraison compte. Une expédition manquée peut perturber tout votre flux de travail. Comment Nous Pouvons Vous Aider : Faites confiance à Ideal Service Alimentaire pour des livraisons ponctuelles, même pendant la période la plus chargée de l’année. Notre équipe logistique travaille sans relâche pour que vos commandes arrivent à temps, afin que vous puissiez vous concentrer sur la création de plats exceptionnels. 4. Profitez de l’Expertise de Notre Équipe de vente Parfois, les meilleures solutions viennent simplement d’une bonne conversation. Notre équipe est là pour offrir un soutien personnalisé, répondre à vos questions et vous aider à tirer le meilleur parti de nos produits et services. Comment Nous Pouvons Vous Aider : Nous sommes le prolongement de votre équipe de cuisine. Que vous cherchiez des conseils sur la planification des stocks ou que vous ayez besoin d’aide pour trouver des produits spécifiques, notre équipe de vente compétente est à votre disposition. 5. Rester à la pointe des tendances saisonnières Les fêtes offrent des occasions uniques de stimuler vos clients en leur proposant des plats spéciaux et festifs. Assurez-vous que votre menu est approvisionné avec les bons ingrédients pour tirer parti de cette période de l’année. Comment Nous Pouvons Vous Aider : Nous vous aiderons à rester à l'avant-garde en vous fournissant des informations sur les tendances et en vous recommandant des produits qui feront briller vos offres pour les fêtes de fin d'année. Nous Sommes Là pour Vous Aider À Réussir Chez Ideal Service Alimentaire, votre succès est notre priorité absolue. Laissez-nous enlever une partie du stress de vos épaules afin que vous puissiez vous concentrer sur la satisfaction de vos clients en cette saison des fêtes. Contactez notre équipe de vente dès aujourd’hui et faisons de cette saison des fêtes votre meilleure réussite ! Visitez notre site web ou contactez-nous directement pour commencer.

What we do

AFE (Advanced Food Equipment) specializes in designing and manufacturing equipment and automatic lines for both Food and Automotive Industries, such as Custom Conveying Systems, Cooling and Freezer Spiral Systems, Automatic Bagel Lines, Automatic Pita Lines, Tunnel Oven, Oven Loading & Unloading Systems, Seeders, Flour Dusters, Intermediate Proofers, Sheeters, Final Proofers, Reciprocators, Lane Diverters, Dough Feeders, Dough Chunkers, Guillotines, Dough Trough Elevators, Board/Pan Stacking and Un-Stacking, Topping Applicators, Slid Motor Install Station, Industrial Press for Shaft & Spring, etc. Our production equipment and automatic lines can be tailored to any manufacturing facility. Our team consists of experts who are passionate about the success of our clients. We pride ourselves on being industry-trusted solution providers and our offices are based in Toronto.

Finished Equipment
Custom Design
Fabrication

ABOUT US

J&S Food Service is a proudly Alberta owned and operated food service distributor. Starting in 1991 distributing cake decorating supplies, J&S Food Service quickly expanded into a full bakery ingredients supplier. Soon enough our reputation for excellent service lead to customers from the food service industry inviting us to expand our product lines and provide the same superior customer service to the Food Service industry in Alberta. Today we are proud to say we have customers throughout Western Canada.

MANDATE

At J&S Food Service our mandate is to provide exceptional customer service to our customers. We offer low minimums for prepaid delivery, low minimums for pick ups, plus other shipping options that might work best for our customers. Our inventory portfolio includes thousands of skus of product, plus we have quick access to thousands more. Most importantly is our personal service. Frequently Asked Questions
Do I need all of my wholesale orders to be placed through Freshline?

While online ordering lends itself to a more convenient experience for both restaurants and wholesalers, we understand 100% adoption could be difficult. Luckily, sales reps & inside sales teams can use Freshline's mobile-friendly dashboard to enter any orders receieved via text, email, or fax. Furthermore, Freshline has the capability to integrate directly with EDI utilized by hotels and restaurant chains, in addition to online ordering.

Even for wholesale that achieve a 30-40% online order rate, they realize significant efficiency gains, reduced operational mistakes, and more insights into their business. To see a detailed overview of Freshline's Wholesale features, please click here.

Can I run both wholesale and retail ordering on Freshline?

Yes! Food distributors can run both wholesale and retail ordering platforms on Freshline. Suppliers can manage a unique URL and design for each, while consolidating picking, packing, and operations under one backend. See Freshline's retail e-commerce capabilities here, and wholesale e-commerce capabilities by clicking here.

How is your service different from Shopify or other B2B platforms?

Unlike other e-commerce platforms that try to build a "one size fits all" for all industries and use cases, Freshline is specialized for the unique ways in which perishables are purchased, packed/processed, and shipped. This include features built for food distributors like catch weight sales, customized delivery zones, schedules and cutoffs, and recurring orders.

To see a full comparison of Freshline vs. other platforms, please visit our comparisons page.

Do you take any commission or a transaction cut?

No. At Freshline, we don't think wholesalers should be penalized for growing their sales. Thus, we don't take any commissions or service fees on top of your orders.

Can I import data from my current platform to Freshline?

Yes - we offer white-glove onboarding for all wholesale customers. This includes helping you export your existing data from your ERP or accounting system, setting up your online ordering portal, training your staff, and supporting you during your launch.

Will this take a long time to set up? Do you offer onboarding or training?

Freshline will do all the hard work for you to launch your online ordering. Our team will set things up, ensure it works with your existing workflow, train your staff, onboard your chefs, and even let you do a totally risk-free pilot. Consequently, most wholesalers are able to set up and launch their ordering platform in weeks, not months.

Are you a marketplace? Will you help with marketing?

Freshline is not a marketplace nor a marketing agency - your products are not listed under the Freshline brand, nor are they featured next to other suppliers. All of your customers, orders, and data are owned by you. Freshline serves as the technology platform that powers your e-commerce and operations experience.

Do you offer digital payments?

Absolutely. We offer food distributors the option of Freshline Payments (i.e. Direct Debit, ACH, Credit Card), or continuing to use existing payments workflows (i.e. manual checks). Wholesalers using Freshline Payments can benefit from lower credit card fees, net terms syncing, ACH/direct debits, automated payment reminders, and digital delivery signatures.

Can I customize the link or website for my ordering portal (URL)?

Absolutely. You can choose any available URL (i.e. yourName.com, or order.yourName.com) to create a fully branded experience. For suppliers without a valid domain name, we provide a free freshlinemarket.com domain.

Do you have any experience in food distribution?

Yes - this is one of the unique benefits of working with Freshline! Prior to building Freshline, our co-founders (and several team members) built a tech-enabled seafood distribution company called Coastline Market, scaling that company to hundreds of restaurants and millions in revenue.

Through this 4 year experience, we dipped our toes across product sourcing, processing, picking/packing, warehousing, and fulfillment. We know the problems, nuances, and challenges food distributors face from first-hand experience, which is why Freshline is best equipped for food distributors and wholesalers.

Ready to get started?

See why hundreds of food suppliers trust Freshline to sell more while saving time.

Flowpoint Environmental Systems are experts in engineered water systems

At Flowpoint, we design and manufacture cloud software controlled turn-key bulk water dispensing stations, turn-key septage receiving stations, and custom process systems for municipal, oil and gas, and industrial applications. We're committed to delivering superior systems and legendary customer service.

Bulk Water Dispensing
Our Bulk Water Dispensing Truckfill Stations are turn-key, self-contained, insulated, and maintenance-friendly. Get water haulers off your distribution system by implementing an automated bulk water truckfill instead of managing a hydrant meter program.
Septage Receiving Systems
Our Septage Receiving Stations are turn-key, self-contained, insulated, and maintenance-friendly. Automated controls help streamline and reduce paperwork while increasing accountability and profitability.
Engineering & Design
All of our designs are modelled in 3D. We provide Solidworks, Autocad, or Revit files to import into your drawings, along with engineering specifications, process control narratives, and quotes to make your life easier.
Software & Support
Our software is written and supported 100% in-house. All panels are UL and CSA certified and thoroughly tested before shipping. We have a dedicated customer support team standing by to help you manage your system.
Custom Fabrication
Flowpoint can design and manufacture custom process skids, including polymer injection systems, booster pump skids, chemical storage, and chemical injection skids. We can integrate automation to create a complete turn-key system for you.

 

 

 

 

Legendary Customer Service


We build collaborative, long-term relationships with our clients. We are driven to look at our client's problems from every angle, anticipate their needs, and deliver superior systems and legendary customer service.

OUR MISSION

“Customer Satisfaction Through Dedication to Quality and Service﻿”

This is achieved by analyzing customers’ products and operations to administer a superior solution to meet their required throughput and packaging needs. 

WHO WE ARE

Complete Packaging specializes in expendable corrugated and wood packaging for a multitude of different products in an abundance of industries including automotive, greenhouse, glass, agriculture, and many more. For over 40 years we have been creating expendable solutions, helping anyone who needs fast and efficient packaging. Focusing on creating safe and effective Packaging while continually rising to the challenge of our clients’ time constraints is what we do best.

OUR PRIORITIES

We are dedicated to providing quality packaging solutions so our customers can ship on time and without issues. We understand the pitfalls that come with having insufficient packaging and with the fast pace environment, these problems can lead to unforeseen lead time issues. Our just-in-time concepts provide our customers with a fast solution to their packaging needs.

© 2025 Complete Packaging LLC.

FOLDING CARTONS

Packaging is an inseparable part of the product image. It is a key factor to success for products in all business sectors. Folding cartons designed and produced by K-1 Packaging Group elevates your brand's message and your products to the highest level.

CORRUGATED BOXES & DISPLAYS

We design and manufacture protective corrugated packaging that is sustainable, beautiful, and economical. Choose either direct flexo print or mounted litho print for targeted marketing in your industry.

Point-of-Sale (POS) displays are highly effective at driving impulse purchases and allow brands to better connect with customers at major retailers such as Target, Costco, Home Depot, Walmart, and more.

RIGID SET-UP BOXES

Rigid set-up boxes enhance perceived value and user opening experience. Elevate your brand above the competition with the luxury of rigid set-up boxes.

PLASTIC BOXES

Proudly present and showcase your product with clear plastic boxes. Allow the consumer to see your prized offering to catch attention and drive sales.

LABELS, FLEXIBLE FILM & POUCHES

Offering both flexographic and digital printing capabilities, we provide visually stunning pressure-sensitive labels to the worldwide consumer product market.

The sachet, stick packs, and pouches we manufacture use multi-layer material constructions engineered to provide required barrier properties to keep products fresh and its shelf-life stable.

THERMOFORM & PAPER PULP PACKAGING

Thermoform containers organize, showcase, and protect your products. We design and produce thermoform packaging, including trays, clamshells, and blisters.

Molded paper pulp packaging is durable, economical, recyclable, and effective. We specialize in manufacturing paper pulp packaging of different designs and configurations for a broad range of products.

SPECIALTY PACKAGING

Utilizing our extensive knowledge of materials selection and our expert manufacturing knowhow, we regularly produce unique and memorable designs for press releases and promotional events.

Founded in 1975, Packaging Personified is a leader in the flexible packaging industry.
Our Story

In 1975, our founders Dominic Imburgia and Phyllis Muccianti sat at a kitchen table and created a flexible packaging business. After leaving Sears, they used their packaging experience to coordinate and procure flexible packaging for third-party use. As entrepreneurs, and firm believers in quality and service, they began their business at that same kitchen table. Within four months, their business needed more room to grow.

Learn More
Capabilities

Since our founding in 1975 our capabilities have expanded each year. Our goal of vertical integration has provided us with the ability to better manage quality, service and cost relative to our competitors.

Learn More
Products

Packaging Personified serves industry leaders with our flexible packaging, graphics proofing and separation, extrusion, printing, converting, lamination, and laser perforation, all done from our multiple manufacturing locations in the center of the United States. Our custom packaging has continuously proven, over decades, to be superior in quality and price. By working directly with our clients, we understand your specific needs and expectations. Whether large or small, we have the flexibility to handle your packaging needs.

PreferPack delivers the finest,

Chipboard Cartons

We are here to help you find corrugated boxes of any size and shape that are perfect for bulk shipping, moving, freight and storage. You'll find padded mailers, envelopes, poly bags, telescoping boxes, trays, jewelry boxes, gift boxes and anything you need to make to protect, store or ship items.

WHO WE ARE

Sterling Contract Packaging is one of the largest contract packaging facilities in the Southeast, specializing in high speed packaging. Founded in 1996, Sterling Contract Packaging maintains a diverse offering of automated packaging capabilities with extensive management experience in consumer sales and retail distribution. Uniquely capable of providing complete project management, Sterling Contract Packaging is involved beginning with package engineering through final package distribution. Our packaging services are tailored to the specific requirements of your products and applications to provide reliable and cost-effective packaging solutions that support your business goals. Additional benefits are realized by the complete control of the inventory process including international sourcing, procurement, transportation, and warehouse management.

LEARN MORE 
OUR FEATURED SERVICES

From custom packaging design and engineering services to stock packaging options, product sourcing, warehousing, and more, we work closely with you to understand your critical issues and requirements. By evaluating the entire packaging process including machinery, materials, and services, we develop complete packaging solutions that increase your productivity and profitability. Our capabilities meet virtually any need in the market.

You deserve a partner who makes it easy to meet your goals. Good news—you just found one. At Meyers, we’re dedicated to creating a sustainable future for people, products, and our planet. PAC's 2023 Sustainability Report

PAC Worldwide’s sustainability mission is to be the leader in sustainable flexible packaging.​ To achieve this, we are focusing on being an active and continuous member of the circular economy by keeping packaging in the economy and out of the environment by designing for recycling, increasing recycled content in our products and creating demand for products that are made of recycled content.​

In 2023, PAC Worldwide made progress towards the US Plastics Pact four targets. We’re dedicated to creating sustainable solutions that meet society’s evolving needs.

All About Packaging, Inc.

We are a family-owned business specializing in thermoformed packaging, including clamshells, blisters, trays, and custom paper solutions for the industrial, retail and medical markets.  It was founded in Appleton, Wisconsin in 1997, to resolve a common problem—the requirement of multiple vendors to successfully package a single product. Their innovative solution: a single source for all their clients’ packaging needs. Today, All About Packaging is known for its innovative approach to packaging, responsive and dedicated team, and unsurpassed quality.

Welcome to Rice Packaging Solutions

A Custom Packaging Solutions Company, Rice Packaging, located in Ellington, Connecticut, offers custom creative solutions for your company’s packaging, folding carton and manufacturing needs. From tabletop displays to formed cartons and customized boxes, to multiple manufacturing and operations services, Rice Packaging delivers packaging solutions with great value.

With over 50 years of experience in packaging, we will work with you to create unique and durable packaging for everything you need. We pride ourselves on our customer service and ability to produce high-quality packaging for our customers. Rice Packaging will work together with you to determine what will work best for your product. We serve the Greater Northeast United States, and have the ability to produce Global products.

When approached strategically, your packaging program can be tailored to maximize budget goals, avoid supply chain pitfalls, and act as a powerful investment in your brand’s equity. Achieve Operational Efficiency with Our Complete Packaging Services

From initial concept development to the final delivery, we manage every aspect of your packaging program. With our end-to-end solutions, we simplify the design process, optimize your supply chains, and ensure your packaging aligns with your vision. Enjoy peace of mind—knowing every detail is managed with precision, care, and efficiency.

Save Time and Reduce Your Workload with a Strategic Packaging Partner

Our seasoned experts manage the production of your packaging from start to finish. We create comprehensive quotes, handle purchasing negotiations, and resolve any disputes as needed, on your behalf. During the manufacturing phase, we offer on-site production support, including press checks and a steadfast commitment to quality control. With our production management services, you can enjoy a seamless flow of inventory, complemented by detailed reporting to keep you well informed.

EXPLORE OUR CUSTOM PACKAGING SERVICES
Create a Strategic Blueprint for Your Unique Needs

The development of your custom packaging begins with an in-depth discovery meeting. We audit your current program to find out what’s working and what’s not. We help you explore structural designs, refine specs, select suitable materials, and curate samples and prototypes. Our high standards of quality control ensure your custom packaging meets functional needs and captures the essence of your brand.

SCHEDULE A CONSULTATION
Optimize Your Packaging Supply Chain with Our Warehousing and Distribution Services

Our efficient distribution system ensures seamless transit of your custom packaging to its intended location. Order supplies whenever you need them through our online ordering system, which can be tailored to your organization’s needs. Through our centrally located warehouse in Houston, TX, we can offer fast turnaround times throughout the continental US. Our ability to integrate with your existing carriers makes it simple to move your packaging through supply chains with ease.

What We can Do for You

Maco PKG, an ISO 9001:2008, SQF 2000 Level 3 certified facility, manufactures heat sealable pouches and custom package bags, along with contract packaging services. We buy roll stock, which includes Military Spec films, metal film, linear low density polyethylene (LLDPE), high density polyethylene (HDPE), nylon/LLDPE blends and polyester/LLDPE blends.

Experienced Management Team
Leading-Edge Design, Engineering, & Manufacturing
In-House Research and Development Lab
Expeditious Co-Packing & Assembly
Affordable & Quick Turn-Around
Custom Flexible Packaging Manufacturing Process

We convert roll stock into pouches, film bags, standup pouches, side gusset bags, sheets, roll stock flexible packaging, and speciality items. Maco PKG pouches and bags, custom made, can be die cut and sealed. Our pouches incorporate vacuum,  water vapor, odor and debris barriers, as well as zipper closures.

Maco PKG supplies a full range of ESD and static shielded bags for the electronics industry and US Military. In addition, we offer a variety of laminations, including film to-foil, paper-to-foil and film-to-film. Metalized film, adhesive and extrusion laminations, and organic packaging solutions are also available.

Virtually Limitless Options

Our custom 3D bags have five sides and can line containers or cover equipment during shipping. We use release coated films when we manufacture these bags, which suits them to package adhesives.

Maco PKG creates heavy duty packaging, including leak-proof seals, duplex double-wall bags, inline die-shape sealing and cutting, heavy-gauge side seals, and tape closures.

With a history of professional experience, we serve many industries such as pharmaceutical, photographic, dental, medical, automotive, military, electronics, retail, and food.

What Makes Us Luxury Retail Packaging Experts

We’re a group of high-end product packaging experts spanning time zones and supply chains. We have a full team of structural engineers, graphic designers, creative strategists, printing & manufacturing technicians, and project managers located in the US, China, and Taiwan. From helping startups launch luxury e-commerce packaging solutions to manufacturing high volumes of custom luxury retail packaging, we have the experience and production capabilities for projects of any size.

Packaging for the Future

We believe that sustainable packaging is the future. It’s the core of everything we do at Zenpack, from structural engineering and materials to fulfillment and shipping. Sustainability starts with intelligent packaging design and sourcing the most eco-friendly materials available. From there, we work with you to create a luxury sustainable packaging strategy that will also save time and money. Achieving this goal can be as simple as reducing fuel costs or reducing kitting time; our team of experts analyzes every step of the packaging journey to achieve your brand’s sustainability goals. Learn more about the Zenpack approach on our sustainability page.

Contract Packaging Solutions

Our contract packaging, or co-packing, solution specializes in providing top-tier services customized to your unique needs. Whether you’re an emerging or established brand, we help you elevate your business with a turnkey solution that includes research & development, display engineering, product manufacturing, technology, and scalability. Our solutions can help you with both bulk packaging and sampling, allowing you to test new products regionally, while ensuring quality and efficiency are maximized.

Co-Packaging Options
Sachet Packaging

Our sachet packaging solutions uses a wide range of advanced packaging materials, we can manufacture flexible sachet packets for confectioneries, cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, powders, liquids, and more.

Learn More
Stick Pack Packaging

We specialize in measuring, weighing, and filling stick packs of various sizes for a wide range of products. These compact packages are not only cost-effective due to their minimal use of raw materials, but they also enhance product marketability with their ease of use. Plus, their slim design allows for efficient packaging, making them an excellent choice for companies looking to introduce new products to the market. This allows you to sell either single, pre-measured stick packs or in bulk to customers.

Learn More
Bulk Powder Packaging

As a single-source co-packer, our solution covers your contract packaging needs for bulk-fill orders for all powders and granules. Get the innovative product design you want while maximizing your production. Bulk powder filling services we provide include:

Variety of package size options, from small pillow pouches to wide mouth jars
Complete design and packaging for your product​
Film construction selection to maximize production efficiency
Learn More
Rollstock Packaging

We offer flexible quality packaging using automated roll stock with a vast range of colors and materials for food products, consumer goods, and more. Rollstock packaging is a great option if you are looking for:

Faster packaging processes
Lower costs​​
High quality graphics​​​
Learn More
Product Sample Packaging

We provide product samples so you can test a new product before full-scale production begins. Benefits of our sample packaging service include:

In-house research and development, product manufacturing, and packaging design
Monitoring the overall quality of your product
Providing production tests throughout the process
Learn More
Flexible Packaging Benefits

We provide a variety of flexible packaging options for a wide range of products. Our lightweight packaging style offers you several benefits including:

Prolonged shelf life
More aesthetic designs​
Lightweight and portable packaging​​
Improved product sustainability​
Learn More
Ryder Contract Manufacturing and Packaging Certifications

Our co-packaging state-of-the-art facilities adhere to the highest level of manufacturing practices. Our quality assurance program is designed to comply with all current Good Manufacturing Practices as outlined by the FDA.

The Ryder Difference
Customized Co-Packaging for Your Brand
Brand Integrity

Our client-centric approach features a dedicated team focused on personalized service, resulting in high satisfaction and long-term partnerships, evidenced by our impressive 85% repeat business rate. Our packaging solutions offer unparalleled versatility, providing a single point of contact for all your packaging needs, which streamlines operations and simplifies your workflow. With scalability at the core of our services, we seamlessly transition from trial batches to full-scale production as your consumer demands grow, ensuring you can scale without changing partners.

Technology

Our state-of-the-art packaging technology delivers faster production rates and lower error margins, resulting in cost savings and quicker market entry for your products. We ensure strict adherence to Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) and FDA guidelines, guaranteeing product safety and compliance with regulatory standards—minimizing the risk of recalls or legal issues. Additionally, our commitment to continuous innovation in packaging provides you with cutting-edge designs that enhance product appeal, functionality, and shelf life, helping you stand out in competitive markets.

Sustainability

We offer eco-friendly packaging options, including biodegradable and recyclable materials, to help you meet the increasing consumer demand for environmentally responsible products. By optimizing logistics, using energy-efficient machinery, and implementing waste reduction practices, we help reduce your carbon footprint, strengthening your commitment to sustainability and giving you a competitive edge in industries where environmental responsibility is key. Additionally, all materials are ethically sourced from suppliers who adhere to strict environmental and ethical standards, and our production processes are designed to minimize impact.

Packaging Services for a Variety of Industries

Our co-packaging solutions span several industries and offer scalability, reduced costs, and access to additional expertise, so you can meet customer demand.

Consumer Packaged Goods
Consumer Packaged Goods

We specialize in designing CPG packaging that not only captures customer attention, but also aligns with your brand’s specifications and market needs. Our comprehensive approach addresses both strategic and technical requirements, ensuring your packaging meets industry standards. Our services provide packaging for a variety of products including sports nutrition, cosmetics, personal care, powders, and organic products.

Wholesale Vinyl Packaging Supplier
Why Choose RLR Packaging?
We Fight the Good Fight for You
It’s All in the Details

At RLR Packaging and Design, we offer custom designs and clear vinyl bags in our stock inventory. We work to meet industry standards and retailer requirements, and we don’t believe there’s anything “stock” about the packaging business; RLR Packaging and Design breaks out of the box through customer service, design, relationships, and integrity.

Our Commitment to Quality

We dedicate ourselves to producing quality packaging.  Our attention to detail ensures worldwide delivery of premium vinyl and phthalate-free products tested for Prop 65 and REACH compliance.

Delivering Great Packaging
When your business demands custom packaging, rely on the expertise of RLR Packaging and Design. We are dedicated to delivering the best packaging solutions to our customers, from basic stock inventory to unique custom designs.
Customized Packaging
Committed to making innovative and custom packaging available to businesses of all sizes, RLR Packaging and Design guarantees a seamless process from start to finish.
We can help fulfill your low-volume or gap orders through our local stock inventory, providing convenient, quick support for your business's needs.
Quality Materials
Vinyl packaging is an excellent option if you want something durable and customizable. At RLR Packaging and Design, we are committed to using the best materials for all your packaging needs, so we offer a wide range of top-quality options. Each of our materials meets the current safety standards, confidently providing quality and safe packaging solutions.
Make the Right Choice
Choose the perfect material for your flexible packaging and storage needs and customize it to emphasize your brand. We are happy to help you find the packaging solution that fits your needs and budget.
Dedicated Customer Service
With over 45 years of combined experience, our trusted team provides affordable solutions and exceptional customer service. We make it a top priority to treat all of our customers like family.
Reach Out to Us Now!
Contact RLR Packaging and Design for affordable and innovative custom packaging solutions. Providing the best wholesale vinyl packaging will take your business to the next level. Contact us today to discover how our vinyl packaging solutions can elevate your brand! Call us at (704) 246-8448 or fill out our online form  (contact form).
Manufacturing
RLR Packaging leverages partnerships with overseas factories that can produce bulk packaging made in PVC, PEVA, mesh, nylon, cotton, polypropylene, LDPE, HDPE, and more. We produce bags for many industries, such as home textiles, cosmetics, juvenile, sporting, pet products, and apparel, to highlight a few.
Competitive Pricing
RLR Packaging's goal is to supply innovative packaging at competitive pricing. We design solution packaging that showcases the value and quality of your products while working within your budget.
Deadlines
RLR Packaging understands the demands of retailers, and our team monitors production to ensure lead times are met. Shipments are scheduled and booked on time for delivery directly to our customers to help save time and money during transit.

THE RUSKIN GROUP
PACKAGING FOR EVERYONE WHO MAKES, SHIPS, OR SELLS ANYTHING TO ANYONE – FROM GLOBAL BRANDS TO STARTUPS TO YOU

We are truly packaging for everyone. We design, produce, & distribute our products to retail stores, offices, warehouses, manufacturing plants, restaurants, stadiums, hotels, and homes throughout North America and beyond.

We work collaboratively with our customers to create the most innovative, cost-effective, & sustainable products using the latest and fastest technologies for designing, sampling, printing, producing, & distributing products.

We’re a one-stop-shop for custom and stock packaging products and shipping supplies. Our global supply chain of world-class manufacturers ensures that we always offer the most ideal and reliable packaging solutions for every customer at the lowest total costs without bias to any one type of product.

Our people are the best and brightest in the industry, bring their diverse backgrounds and perspectives to every solution, and share our core values, resulting in world-class products and customer experiences.

Browse our website to learn more about who we are, what we do, and how we can help you achieve your goals with more effective and efficient packaging solutions.

Visit our on-line store to shop today for thousands of in-stock packaging products and shipping supplies.

CUSTOM RETAIL, INDUSTRIAL, & CONSUMER PRODUCTS PACKAGING SOLUTIONS

For over 125 years, we have been an industry-leading designer and producer of customized, innovative, sustainable, and cost effective packaging products for retailers, industrial and consumer products manufacturers – from startups to global organizations in just about every industry. Our packaging protects your products, supports your brand promise, and enhances your brand value.

Our custom packaging – which includes folding cartons, corrugated boxes, displays, industrial packaging, gift boxes, e-commerce mailing bags & boxes, and customized packaging & shipping supplies – is a tangible expression of your company and your brand. Our experience, leadership, and expertise guarantee great customer service and the best quality products & services.

Learn More

IN-STOCK PACKAGING AND SHIPPING PRODUCTS

We stock over 20,000 SKUs of packaging products & shipping supplies in warehouses across the country to provide the widest range of solutions available for next-day delivery to everyone everywhere. Stock packaging is ideal for businesses and individuals who need reliable, cost effective products quickly, whether in one or one hundred locations.

Our industry-leading range of best-in-class products makes us a one-stop-shop for everything you need to package, store, transport, display, market, and deliver your products. We source these products from manufacturers around the world to guarantee the best products at the lowest total costs. If you need to package and/or ship anything, check out our store today!

Learn More

The Ruskin Group today is strategically diversified into three primary businesses that work together through a common organization.
CONSUMER PRODUCTS PACKAGING SOLUTIONS

Our CPG packaging protects, transports, displays, & markets your products to customers in-stores, on-shelves, & on-line. Our customers range from the most respected & recognized global brands to the newest start-ups. We offer the widest range of products of anyone – from printed folding cartons to club-store boxes to point-of-purchase displays to corrugated shippers, packers & trays & so much more. We focus on new products, private label & regional brands, seasonal & promotional packaging at all stages of your supply chain, with the fastest turnarounds & lowest total costs, from concept to full-scale production.

Learn More

RETAIL & E-TAIL PACKAGING SOLUTIONS

Our retail packaging is for everyone who sells anything to anyone – from the largest chains to the latest e-tail & subscription e-commerce businesses. Our products range from the most innovative in-store gift boxes, shopping bags, displays, & wraps to mailers, envelopes, bags, & everything else you need to package & ship products directly to consumers – from your warehouse, your store, your plant, your office, or your home. We help you develop, launch, and scale your company, your brand, & your products with the widest variety of stock & custom packaging in the industry.

Learn More

PACKAGING & SHIPPING SUPPLIES

We are the only packaging company in the nation to offer custom & stock products in all packaging categories with over 20,000 SKUs for next-day delivery. Our customers cross every industry – retailers & e-tailers, industrial & consumer products manufacturers, professional service firms, hospitality & entertainment businesses, transportation & construction companies, technology & health care providers, home offices, & individual consumers. We produce, distribute, & source everything from corrugated boxes, poly bags, & labels to bubble wrap, office, safety & janitorial supplies.

CONTACT US
Agile. Responsive. Experienced. Everything you need in a packaging partner.
Need a quick-turn delivery so you can hit your shipping deadline? We can do that.

What about cost-effective, custom packaging that will help you offer competitive product rates? Yeah, we can do that, too.

We are experts in optimizing design and materials in order to reduce your costs. With more than three decades in packaging design, we continually grow to develop more creative and cost-effective ways to keep our customers competitive with their packaging.

Our team is agile, designed to pivot and grow with you as you expand your product line and packaging needs. We can meet quick-turn deadlines for both large and small volume runs.

Customized packaging for even the most challenging products

Frustrated by having to work with 3 or more manufacturers to find one protective packaging solution for your product? We feel that. For years, companies have struggled with finding an all-in-one solution for packaging that deviates from the standard needs. Fortunately, we’re equipped to provide a consolidated customer experience to process your custom packaging needs all in one place.

Our custom packaging solutions will not only reduce your production time and costs, but you also benefit from standardized quality assurance that you can pass along to your customers.

OUR PRODUCTS
Effective packaging. Eco-Friendly process.

Packaging has historically been one of the largest culprits of environmental waste. We are changing that.

ProtectPac is focused on bringing packaging to the market through eco-friendly processes that consume fewer natural resources, such as water and energy. Our goal is to reduce environmental waste while still providing the quality of product that our customers (and their customers) have come to expect.

Learn more about our environmental responsibility here.
LEARN MORE
Reduce waste, not quality.
At ProtectPac, we take our impact on the environment seriously. We’ve devoted years to creating a sustainable packaging process that protects natural resources for future generations. Our waste reduction strategy focuses on minimizing energy use and landfill input, while increasing transportation efficiency.

We are proud to announce that we’ve introduced higher-yield materials into our production. This means our products are lighter to produce, transport and use, which equates to reduced energy use and greenhouse gas emissions.

Learn more about what ProtectPac is doing to product resources for future generations.
