MORE ABOUT OUR PROJECTS
A SOLUTION FOR AN
AUTOMOTIVE CHALLENGE

One of our clients needed industrial packaging for an automotive part that varied slightly based on which wheel it was connected to.  We came to the rescue with a shipping box that contained an adjustable corrugated insert. By folding the insert one of four different ways, our client could use the same box and insert for all four unique parts – saving time, money and storage space.

Who We Are

Custom Packaging Products

At Custom Packaging Products, we are a full-service packaging supplier and contract packaging company. We provide all your industrial packaging needs, like bulk bags or shipping pallets, as well as packaging fulfillment of your products in our facility. We can custom design your packaging according to your needs and provide blending, milling, trans-loading, and packaging in any size bags (25 kg poly woven, poly bags, paper valve bags, bulk bags, etc.). Whether you have a requirement to load frac sand, fertilizer, feed, seed, or any other products, we can build a turn-key solution to load one truckload or hundreds.

What We Do

All Aspects of Industrial Packaging Since 1973

We are a major packaging supplier of bulk bags/FIBC bags, pallets, PE Bags, and many more packaging items. We can custom build them from the ground up, and then deliver them on time with the highest quality. We have over 50 years of combined experience in the packaging market. Our sales team, manufacture representatives, and all our staff members have been trained to ensure you receive the appropriate packaging for your situation. We are based in Houston, Texas but supply companies in many states.

Custom Packaging for Your Food Products
With Over 50 Years of Packaging Innovation, Pro Pac Specializes in Custom Food Packaging Solutions

Custom High-Speed Integrated Food Packaging Lines

Integrate your packaging line to increase speed and reduce material and labor costs.

Pro Pac line integration specialists will engineer a cost-effective packaging process designed to perfectly package your products, exceed your production requirements, and work seemlessly within the capabilities of your facility.

We will determine and supply the best machinery for every packaging station from the point where your product enters your packaging area to the point where it's ready to ship.

Our line integraton experts will increase your production, lower your costs, and prepare your products for shipping.

Custom Printed & Manufactured Food Packaging Materials

Give your products powerful presence with our high-quality packaging materials.

Our material experts will work with you to determine the best custom packaging materials for your products.

We specialize in custom printed laminate roll stock films, beautifully printed shrink bundling film, custom shrink sleeves for all shapes and sizes of bottles and cans, stand-up pouches for snack foods and cereals, folding cartons for nearly every kind of retail grocery product, and custom labels for bottles, cans, trays and tubs.

Our custom material experts will help bring your products to life on retail shelves.

Custom Food Co-Packing & Assembly Services

Get your products to market with our fast co-packing services.

We specialize in VFFS bagging and pouch filling, shrink bundle beverage re-packing, custom carton kitting, and big box pallet display assembly.

Our snack packaging crews quickly and precisely bag large quantities of your cookies, crackers, and snacks.

Our beverage re-packing teams work high-speed, registered-print shrink bundling lines to quickly produce high-volume runs of bundled variety packs.

Our specially-skilled cartoning operators meticulously load your primary packaged food products into cartons with extraordinary efficiency.

Improve Your Packaging with Pro Pac
Packaging Equipment

Want to increase your production speeds? Lower your costs? Our equipment engineers will design the perfect integrated packaging line for your products and your facility.

Packaging Materials

Need custom-printed laminated film? How about corrugated boxes? We can bring your products to life and to market with custom-printed high-quality pouches and films.

Co-Packing Services

Have large quantities to turn around quickly? Specializing in large-volume, fast-turnaround packaging projects, we can package nearly any product, including snack foods. Even pet food!

Order Fulfillment & Distribution

Need to ship your product to distribution centers, retail stores, and your individual customers? We provide fast, accurate order fulfillment and on-time delivery.

Tech Services & Equipment Parts

Waiting too long for a service tech to repair your packaging machinery? Our parts and service professionals understand your urgency, and will get you up and running right away.

PACKAGING MACHINES AND PRODUCTS THAT KEEP YOU AHEAD OF THE PACK

Keep your operation smooth, efficient, and profitable with high-performing packing machines and packaging products from Impackt Packaging.

Customer demand runs high in our industry. Through our machines and products, we’re focused on giving you exactly what you need, exactly when you need it — to stay ahead of demand, confidently serve your customers, and scale your business.

We don’t develop these solutions blindly. Our team surveys the market to identify the industry’s most pressing needs and greatest opportunities to evolve. As a result, our packaging machines and packaging products are some of the world’s best solutions for packaging, shipping, and retail operations.

We stay ahead of our competition, so you can stay ahead of yours.

To talk to a professional about getting Impackt Packaging machines and products to power your shipping and retail business, contact us here or call us today at 908-587-9200.

HIGH-GRADE PACKAGING MACHINES

Our machines put efficiency, precision, and power into your packing line. We’ve raised the bar above other packaging machines suppliers by building solutions you won’t find anywhere else in the world.

It’s easy to get one of these machines for your business, with leasing, financing, and free trial options available. Plus, we’ll take care of all maintenance with Impackt service packages. All of these benefits combine to give your business heightened efficiency, reduced costs, greater output, and a competitive edge.

SWIFTPACK

The SwiftPack rapid bagging machine is our introductory machine, capable of packing and labeling up to 900 bags an hour. This unit handles a versatile range of materials and bag sizes, giving you the power of four workers on your packaging line.

Frequently Asked Questions
Below you'll find answers to some common questions around creating a custom box. Every order is little different though, so don't hesitate to reach out with anything else you might be wondering.
Can I get an instant quote for my order?

Yes, you can select your size, material, and quantity on our free 3D design tool to instantly view a quote for your project. As you upload artwork, add text, or color the background in each panel of the 3D model, you'll see your Unit Price update in real-time.

What packaging products can I order from Packlane?

At Packlane, we offer a variety of packages for you to choose from and customize. Our custom packaging boxes include Shipping Boxes, Mailer Boxes, and Product Boxes. They can be ordered in both stock and custom sizes at low minimums. These box styles are perfect for either retail packaging or ecommerce deliveries. Our Mailer Box and Shipping Box cardboard products are safe to mail, while our Product Box packages are intended for display (or to be placed within a shipping-safe box when sent out for delivery). Get started with our easy-to-use box designer and create custom printed packaging boxes for your brand today.

What if I'm designing in Adobe Illustrator?

If you're building your design on one of our Illustrator templates, you can submit your file on our Dieline Upload tool and a quote for your project will be sent to you ASAP. You can also email your dieline to our customer support team and we'll send you back a quote. If you do not have packaging artwork for your box yet, you can get a rough quote by applying a solid color on any panels of our 3D design tool where you will want your design printed.

How does your 3D box designer work?

If you have individual artwork elements such as logos, images or text, you can customize your box specifications directly on our 3D design tool and receive pricing on that same page. As you build your design on the 3D box model, you will see your Unit Price update in real-time to reflect any changes that affect your project's pricing. Once you have finalized your design, you can proceed directly to checkout, save your design for later, or even share your design with friends or colleagues!

What is the turnaround time on my order?

Our Standard turnaround for most custom packaging orders is around 10 business days and Rush turnaround is 7 business days. These turnarounds do not include transit time (1 - 7 business days depending on your location). Special custom or bulk orders may require a few extra days to get setup and produced. Please note that during extremely busy times of year some orders may take longer to complete. While delivery estimates cannot be guaranteed, all dates shown at checkout are the quickest estimate we offer. If your delivery date is time sensitive, we highly recommend choosing Rush production and expedited shipping for your box orders.

What happens after I place my order? Do I get a proof before printing?

After checkout, our dedicated Prepress team will review your design for any technical concerns and send a 2D digital proof of your custom boxes to your email within 24 hours. If any changes need to be made, you can send a note directly to our Prepress team through the proof page and they'll be happy to help with finalizing your design for printing.

Will I see a proof for my order?

All new orders will receive a digital proof within 24 hours of completing the checkout process.

How do I know if my art is printable?

Our dedicated in-house Prepress team will review your custom box design for any technical concerns (artwork resolution, blurriness, splits, thin lines, and bleeds) and if found, will note them for your attention in the proof. If you're unsure of how to fix any printing concerns that are noted, our Prepress representatives are happy to help you through the process. It's important to keep in mind that our team does not check for spelling or grammar errors, nor do they provide any subjective feedback on design content.

Can you print inside the boxes?

Yes! We can print on the inside of any of our corrugated box styles. This includes Mailers, Shipping Boxes, and Tuck Tops (our secret menu product!). Product Boxes are currently limited to printing on the exterior only. You can even use our online box designer to design the inside of your custom boxes. For Shippers and Tuck Tops, we currently require a 2D dieline template be submitted for both the interior and exterior so we can set up your order as a custom order. You can also submit designs this way for our Mailer boxes, if you prefer to build on a 2D Illustrator template instead of our free 3D box design tool.

What choices affect my pricing?

As a high-volume producer with scale economies, Packlane provides the industry's most competitive prices on custom printed boxes available. Pricing is generally a factor of five things: dimensions, box style, ink coverage on the box, box material, and quantity (higher quantities = bulk savings). Custom orders of 5,000 or more can be eligible for volume discounts. If you have questions about pricing or choices that can affect your custom packaging order, our customer support team is happy to help!

OUR MANUFACTURING PROCESS
Businesses that rely on the safe, compliant packaging of their products — from food and beverage distributors to medical device makers and military contractors — trust our manufacturing process to deliver quality in every order they place. Our experience supplying innovative packaging solutions to most major industries means we understand and adhere to all applicable industry guidelines and expectations.

In addition to our regular products, we specialize in short run and customized products to accommodate even the most singular requirements. Moreover, to ensure that our products are always of the highest possible quality, we employ progressive quality control procedures and product testing. As a result, we can offer standard and custom-made solutions made from more than 50 products that we routinely have in stock.

CALTEX PLASTICS INDUSTRIAL AND COMMERCIAL PACKAGING
Caltex Plastics is a premier manufacturer of industrial and commercial packaging. We convert laminated multi-layer barrier products into custom pouches, tubing, sheets, and sheeting for the electronic, military, food, pharmaceutical, and packaging industries. We also produce quality polyethylene can and box liners from low- and high-density resins with our 16 monolayer extruders. Our objective is to provide our customers with the highest quality products in a timely and cost-effective manner. For more than 35 years, Caltex Plastics has proudly been able to exceed customer expectations in service, distribution, and product quality.

The Caltex Plastics Difference

At Caltex Plastics, we’re one of the leading custom plastic and printed bag manufacturers in the country. That’s why we ensure that we always have the largest selection of rollstock on hand to meet all of our customers’ needs. Moreover, since we operate 24 hours a day, seven days a week, our service and delivery times are simply unparalleled.

 

For poly bag producers, having the right packaging materials is only part of the job. Giving each customer’s order the time, attention and expertise it deserves is what sets us apart from our competitors. The Caltex difference — as we like to call it — is our commitment to matching our market-leading materials with the best in customer service, plastic packaging distributing services and around the clock production operations.

 

Let’s face it: You have a big choice to make when it comes to deciding who you’ll trust with your packaging material needs. Beyond getting ample protection for your products, you also want to work with a custom commercial packaging supplier who will get the smallest details in your order correct. With decades in the business of taking on even the most challenging custom orders, we’re the company you can consider a true partner in your supply chain.

 

To learn more about how we can help with your plastics needs, fill out our contact form today.

Our wide selection of oxygen and moisture barrier materials means we have a product to suit your needs, from dry foods and powders, to meats and vacuum packaging applications.
We offer the highest quality, most economically priced static shield packaging available. The durable buried metal construction gives Faraday Cage performance needed to effectively shield these components against static charges.
Caltex Plastics is a manufacturer of quality custom bags and film. With our 16 mono layer extruders, we produce quality polyethylene can and box liners in many different thicknesses and widths, and with high or low density resins.
We have a large inventory of materials that cover a wide range of military specifications. We can provide machine made pouches from 1” x 2” to 48” x 120”, and hand-made shrouds of unlimited size.
We manufacture pouches from all types of flexible heat sealable laminates based on aluminum foil, poly, nylon, paper, and other materials which can be converted into flat and zipper pouches, tubing and roll stock.
What Is the Importance of Packaging?

Packaging your products is usually necessary for transporting them and getting them to market, but it’s also a huge opportunity to increase sales. According to a recent survey, 72 percent of consumers say that packaging design influences their purchasing decisions. If you’re not putting enough focus on your packaging, you’re missing out on potential sales and opportunities to promote your brand. Let’s explore how product packaging can affect sales and why it’s so important.

The Products at N.A.L.
N.A.L. Company® goal is to provide customers with quality, cost effective products with quick turn around, creative packaging solutions, and first-class customer service. Our products are carefully crafted and rigorously inspected to ensure you receive the most reliable product in the marketplace. Here are just a few of our creatively designed products, add-ons, and services
VIEW OUR PRODUCTS


Corner Board and Edge Protectors

This product consists of multiple layers of laminated, recycled paperboard that are formed into a 90º angle. The product functions as in-transit protection, load stabilization, and increased stacking strength support for products. CPPS, Weatherguard, and printing are additional add-on features.

Surface Protection

Delicate products? Protect them with our variety of Surface Protection Products and Chipboards. These products can be applied to various shaped packages and provide containment, protection, and separation during your product’s shipment. Tailor your surface protection needs from our different product classes. N.A.L. Company®, Inc also has Optional Value-added Configurations that can be added to your product to enhance its performance.

Specialty Conversion

We provide special packaging solutions using all types of paperboards, fine paper, paper-backed foils, cloths, velour, poly-coated surfaces, clay-coated boxboard, and other laminated substrates. Some of our custom packaging products include our patent pending Strongbox Technology and The Guardian Line.

6/22/54 FIRST ROLL OF PAPER AT ROYAL FIBER CO.
 
The History Behind this Pioneering Packaging Company

We’ve been around for a few years. N.A.L. Company® was established in 1972. We began our business by producing products such as brick strapping which evolved into corner protectors, flat sheeting, lamination services and other paperboard packaging products. These products can be found in today’s marketplaces such as construction, apparel, automotive, food and beverage, and big box retailers. Our company has been located in Mt. Orab, Ohio since its inception. N.A.L. Company has remained a loyal member of the local community and environment for more than 45 years. As we’ve grown, N.A.L. Company has expanded its corner board and industrial packaging lines by adding another manufacturing facility with laminating capabilities, lining services, rewinders, ream cutting and an additional corner board machine.

We’ve come a long way since 1972 in terms of product line, customer relationships, and company size. Today, we have our sights set to the future, with goals to continuously develop and improve our product lines, provide plenty of growth opportunities for our employees, and grow the superior customer service experience you have come to expect from N.A.L. Case Study: CPPS™
PRODUCT DEVELOPED | CPPS™

We noticed a pattern in customers requesting a product that would allow their packaging personnel to not have to constantly hold a corner board in place while they were packing the products together. Months of research and development were spent on adhesive backed corner boards, auto feed tape machines, and visiting different plants to help design a product for their application. The end result? A product that produces very little scrap, occupies very little time, and is cost effective without producing safety issues or ergonomic hazards.

Corner board perforation placement system, or CPPS™, patented and trademarked is made of laminated sheets of paperboard, formed into a 90˚ angle with perforated, partially delaminated paperboard located inside the corner board. The product allows tearing motions to create a tag that will protrude perpendicularly to the corner board, then sandwich between two products to hold the corner board while the full product is packed for shipment. By applying CPPS™ to packing products, users can save time, resources, and improve safety functions. With the development of this product, we managed to create a product exceedingly useful for manufacturing and packaging industries that had not been developed before.

nVenia is a Packaging Equipment Manufacturer Supplying Integrated Primary, Secondary and End-of-Line Packaging Solutions Focused on Quality, Durability and Innovation

nVenia brings Duravant packaging leaders Arpac, Hamer-Fischbein, and Ohlson Packaging together to create next-level packaging equipment integration and innovation. One name, in one location, with one shared focus: our customers and the problems they need to solve.

As your packaging machine suppliers, we can provide a wide range of primary, secondary, and end-of-line packaging systems thanks to our many capabilities. Our expertise as packing machine manufacturers includes conceptualizing, designing, manufacturing, installing, and integrating, and servicing this equipment.

To learn more about what makes us a leader among primary and secondary packaging companies, get in touch with us today or request a quote.

Featured Products

Our primary, secondary, and end-of-line packaging machinery can be found in the CPG, food, and industrial sectors. Practically any type of operation looking to automate its processes, increase production, and reduce labor costs can benefit from choosing nVenia as their packaging automation partner.

The VLA Open Mouth Bagging Machine uses an innovative axial bag movement to achieve bagging rates of up to 17 bags per minute on pre-made open mouth bags.

Our ARPAC Brand EXTREME XL models are workhorses in the industry, featuring a proprietary design that provides fast, user-friendly and reliable operation.

nVenia’s VPC palletizing solution offers the quality and performance features demanded by the industry. With user-friendly touch screen displays, adjusting patterns is effortless. Each layer is meticulously stacked and compressed, ensuring the creation of a perfectly stable pallet.

The ARPAC Brand EXTREME XR model is nVenia’s highest performance wrapping system, ideal for high speed applications that require accurate and repeatable shrink seal quality.

 NATIONWIDE TRADE LABEL
MANUFACTURER

DLS has been a preferred B2B label supplier since 1985. Over the years, we’ve grown to be one of the largest trade-only label manufacturers in the country. We provide high-quality, custom-printed pressure sensitive labels to distributors throughout the U.S. And all of our products, from blank labels to full color high-definition labels, are produced utilizing the latest in flexographic and digital printing technologies.

 

DLS’s dedicated team is passionate about labels. Our motto is, “We only succeed when you do.” And we’re always ready to share our expertise with our distributors to help you grow your business. Whether your customer needs 100 or a 100,000,000 labels, DLS helps with any size order. We are a nationwide label converter. Our headquarters is centrally located in Itasca, Illinois, and DLS has label production and warehouse facilities located in five states across the U.S. Our nationwide presence means fast, affordable delivery to your customers. In 2019, DLS became a member of the TSC Auto ID Technology family, a global leader in the AIDC barcode printer industry. DLS is the manufacturer of OEM media for both TSC and Printronix thermal Auto ID printers.

 

 INDUSTRY-LEADING LABEL SUPPLIER

COMPLETE LABEL SOLUTION

5 Locations

We operate 5 locations (Chicago, Atlanta, Dallas, Reno, and Riverside, CA). This allows us to ship all of our products quickly and affordably.

Distributor Only

Your Silent Partner

Manufacturing Strength

We have more than 35 years experience. Our experts provide the label manufacturing muscle you need to sell high-quality labels.

Cost Efficiency

 OUR COMMITMENT TO SUSTAINABILITY

 

We’ve instituted eco-friendly label manufacturing practices aimed at recycling, reducing waste and decreasing the need for fossil fuels. We are especially proud of our fuel pellet program. By turning label production waste into fuel pellets, we keep over 2 million pounds of waste per year out of landfills. Additionally, as a coal alternative, these fuel pellets generate electricity while reducing CO2 emissions by 40%. It is our hope that with sustainability efforts like this, we can continue to not only do the right thing, but also help you reach buyers who take corporate responsibility seriously.

EMBALLAGES INNOVANTS
En savoir plus

Depuis plus de 35 ans, Creopack se spécialise dans la conception de A à Z de solutions d’emballages novatrices pour un large éventail d’industries.

Jouer la vidéo

Le choix de la bonne mise en caisse et du bon emballage pour votre entreprise peut avoir un impact durable sur vos résultats et sur la perception de votre marque. Investir dans des matériaux et des processus de haute qualité peut contribuer à réduire les coûts, à améliorer l’efficacité et à créer une impression durable auprès des clients.

Les matériaux de mise en caisse et d’emballage industriels de Creopack sont conçus grâce à Emballages Innovants™. Après une analyse intégrale des besoins de votre entreprise, nous vous proposons la solution la plus fiable et la plus rentable pour acheminer vos produits, quelle que soit la méthode d’expédition.

Grâce à Creopack, garantissez que vos produits soient non seulement protégés pendant l’expédition, faciles à emballer et à déballer, tout en réduisant l’empreinte de votre entrepôt et en minimisant les déchets.

Nos services d’emballages

L’optimisation de votre chaîne d’approvisionnement, l’amélioration de l’efficacité de vos opérations et la réduction de vos coûts sont les expertises de Creopack. Notre équipe d’experts certifiés en logistique est prête à vous offrir une gamme complète de services adaptés à votre secteur industriel. Du démontage à l’emballage en passant par la manutention, le déménagement et l’entreposage.

Emballage sur site
Emballage et mise en caisse sur site Nos équipes d’emballage mobile nous permettent d’intervenir directement à votre usine, mettant ainsi…
Mise en conteneur
Service de mise en conteneur et de protection de vos produits Avec notre site situé à Chateauguay spécialement dédié aux…
Entreposage & Stockage
Service d’entreposage et de stockage Avec notre site situé à Chateauguay spécialement dédié aux services d’emballages et de logistique, Creopack…
La signature Creopack

Chez Creopack, la recherche et l’innovation sont au cœur de nos processus. Notre savoir-faire et notre volonté de proposer des emballages toujours plus innovants qui répondent entièrement au cahier des charges de nos clients nous ont amenés à concevoir des solutions uniques sur le marché de l’emballage.

Un bon système d’emballage doit être polyvalent tout en minimisant l’impact sur les coûts de transport et de stockage à long terme. Nos experts analysent attentivement votre logistique pour vous proposer des solutions qui vous permettront d’économiser.
Faites confiance à notre expertise en conception d’emballage pour améliorer votre image de marque et optimiser votre logistique. Contactez-nous dès aujourd’hui pour découvrir comment nos solutions peuvent répondre à vos besoins spécifiques.

En savoir plus sur la signature Creopack
Choisir Creopack, c’est opter pour des emballages de qualité, uniques sur le marché et répondant parfaitement à vos exigences.
1986
La naissance
Depuis plus de 30 ans, Creopack imagine, conçoit et fabrique des solutions d'emballages innovantes dans le respect de la nature et des hommes pour de multiples secteurs et industries.
3
Usines de fabrication
Creopack c'est 3 usines de fabrication, transformation et conception. Toutes nos usines sont situées au Québec dans l'agglomération de Montréal. Une usine est dédiée aux solutions d'emballages en bois. Une autre est spécialisée dans les solutions de packaging avec de la mousse. Enfin, notre dernière usine a été spécialement imaginée pour répondre à vos services d'emballages : stockage et entreposage, mise en caisse de produits volumineux et mise en conteneur.
1200
Modèles chaque année
Tous les ans, notre bureau d'étude, animé par nos designers industriels, imagine et crée pas moins d'un millier de nouvelles solutions de packaging.
+ 500
Clients et partenaires
Creopack c'est plus de 500 clients et partenaires réparties dans plus de 10 industries à travers le monde entier.
0
Déchets
Chez Creopack, nous sommes conscients de l’importance de réduire notre empreinte environnementale, c’est pourquoi nous abordons la conception des emballages avec une perspective équilibrée, en alliant la protection des produits avec l’optimisation des ressources.
Large gamme de caisses et d’emballages sur mesure

Afin d’assurer la protection de tout type de marchandises lors de leur transport ou de leur manutention, Creopack propose une gamme complète de produits de mise en caisse, d’emballage et d’expédition fabriqués à partir de matériaux d’emballage de la plus haute qualité afin de garantir une protection maximale des marchandises.

En tant que fournisseurs d’emballages, nous savons que chaque produit qui doit être transporté nécessite des soins particuliers. C’est pourquoi nous proposons des services de conception d’emballage afin de répondre parfaitement à tous les types de contraintes que vous pouvez rencontrer (étanchéité, robustesse, malléabilité). Ainsi, quel que soit votre bien ou équipement à transporter, nous pouvons vous aider à le protéger efficacement grâce à nos différents produits d’emballage.

Nos caisses et boites
Des solutions de mise en caisse adaptées aux besoins des clients

Creopack n’est pas seulement spécialisé en conception d’emballage sur mesure. Conscients des contraintes pouvant être rencontrées par les entreprises, nos consultants sont à l’écoute de vos demandes et peuvent vous proposer des services personnalisés uniques.

Forts d’une équipe de design expérimentée et d’un parc d’équipement à la fine pointe de la technologie, chacun des emballages que nous créons pour vous a été testé et optimisé en conséquence. Notre flotte de camions de transport et d’équipements mobiles peut également vous faciliter la vie puisque nous pouvons nous rendre directement à votre emplacement, soit pour livrer des équipements, ou les emballer sur place.

As one of the largest full-service packaging suppliers in North America, Crownhill Packaging is renowned for its commitment to providing businesses with high-quality and reliable packaging products and supplies. We offer all-inclusive services from custom packaging services to logistics and distribution to help streamline your supply chain, reduce costs, and improve customer service.

Packaging Solutions Start Here®

Crownhill knows packaging. Whether it’s consultation on your best packaging options, design for your packaging and displays, or materials to protect your products in transit, we have a custom packing solution for your business. Our in-house packaging experts can manage design, fabrication, sub-assembly, and any co-packing or fulfillment services you need.

With our state-of-the-art facilities and cutting-edge technology, we ensure that your packaging is produced efficiently and to the highest quality standards. And with our commitment to eco-conscious practices, you can feel confident that your custom packaging is not only visually striking but also environmentally friendly.

Don’t settle for anything less than the best when it comes to your packaging needs. Choose Netpak and experience the difference that expert craftsmanship, swift production, and eco-conscious practices can make for your brand. As of January 1, 2014 the Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN) will mandate that all ICANN accredited registrars begin verifying the Registrant WHOIS contact information for all new domain registrations and Registrant contact modifications.

Why this domain has been suspended

Email address has not been verified.

Frequently asked questions

Why was my domain suspended?
ICANN requires that the domain registrant's contact information or changes to the registrant's WHOIS information be verified within 15 calendar days. If the data is not verified in this timeframe, ICANN mandates that the website be suspended pending the verification.

How can I remove the suspension on my domain?
The suspension of the domain will be removed after the WHOIS information is successfully verified. Please update the WHOIS information with complete and accurate contact details through your domain service provider. Once updated you will recieve a new verification email.

Once the suspension is removed, when will my website come back online?
We estimate it may take 24 to 48 hours for the website to come back online.

Who is ICANN?
ICANN is responsible for the coordination of the global Internet's systems of unique identifiers and, in particular, ensuring its' stable and secure operation. ICANN maintains policies and specifications for registrars and registrants to abide by.

What is WHOIS?
WHOIS services provide public access to data on registered domain name holders. Registered Name Holders are required to provide accurate and reliable contact details to their Registrar to update WHOIS data for a Registered Name.

Our Custom Packaging Promise

At LeKAC Sourcing Limited, we’re committed to providing your business with unique, high-quality packaging that’s perfect for your brand.

Our packaging specialists ensure you are completely satisfied with your order and make it as easy as possible to have custom packaging that will make an impact and stand out from the crowd.

Whether you need paper bags, gift boxes, mailers or other promotional items, finding a solution that is tailored to your specific needs is our mission. Our dedicated team will provide you with full support and a streamlined process for a quick and effortless turnaround.

Have an Idea?

Our custom packaging specialists will work with you closely to visualise your packaging concept

Know What You Want?

Send us your artwork and our in-house graphic designers will ensure it is factory-ready and OK it for production

Want Suggestions?

We’re here to help and it’s as simple as that. If you need feedback, we’re the team for your brand

Need Inspiration?

We’re on all major social media platforms! Check out our Instagram page for the latest in packaging trends and news

Frequently Asked Questions

What are your COVID protocols?

At the moment, we’re open by appointment only at both of our locations (Markham, ON and Montreal, QC). Our in-house procedures include maintaining a distance of 6 feet at all times and regular sanitization of high-traffic areas. Additionally, masks must be worn at all times. If you’re not quite comfortable with coming in, you can also opt to schedule a video or phone call with one of our Business Development representatives.

I don’t see the product I want, can you still help me?

Yes, the products we’ve shown on our website are just examples of what we’ve done for our clients. We can source products that match your packaging such as stickers, business cards, POP displays, mugs, pens and more!

When should I place my order?

Our specialists would advise placing your order about 4 to 5 months before you will need to use it. Packaging is an essential part to your brand, so it should be one of the first decisions you make after your product. This time frame allows for design approval, sample products, and shipment of your order. For example, if you want special holiday packaging to use in November, you should contact us to start the process in June or July.

What is my limit in terms of design and print?

Absolutely no limit! That’s the beauty of LeKAC Sourcing. We don’t want to limit your creativity which is exactly why there is no cap on what we can do for you! Choose from one-colour, multicolour, foil and more!

Can you help me with dimensions?

Yes we can! Our design specialists can calculate measurements for specific product packaging to ensure that everything will fit.

CONTAINER CORPORATION OF CANADA
Packaging Since 1977

Founded in 1977, Container Corporation of Canada is an award winning, world leader in the manufacturing of innovative corrugated and plastic packaging with an emphasis on environmental preservation and responsibility for sustainable packaging. Since its inception, Container Corporation has been guided by a combination of research, expertise, and instinct, born out of years of listening carefully to their customers’ dynamic needs.

Container Corporation’s commitment to building a cleaner, more eco-friendly world is further evident in its uniquely designed 28 acre Nature Sanctuary that is situated in the center of its three building campus, available for the public to enjoy all year round.

Hello There!

At Bullseye we believe that in an ever-changing economy, a specialized co-packer can be your most valuable asset. When investing capital, expanding floor space, or increasing human resources is not a realistic option, turn to Bullseye to provide the competitive advantage in your industry.

We are an extension of your business - a partner that can help you effectively and efficiently (and immediately!) get to market. Demand and change are two things that our team gets excited about. Why? Because we have the experience, expertise, and operations to deliver on and meet both.

Why co-pack?

Ineffective. Time-consuming. Complicated. Sound familiar?

Yes, variety packs, specialty packs, and displays can be all of that. But Bullseye removes the struggles and simplifies things for your company - we’ll do all the assembly and preparation for your variety pack in our warehouse.

Send us your bulk product, packaging, and finished format specs and we’ll implement your marketing or production plans for you. No need to flex your staffing size, shut down your production line, or segregate your warehouse space. You can keep focusing on what you do best, and we’ll do what we do best.

Together, we’ll produce simply amazing products.

Actiofarma

HOMEABOUT USSERVICES NEWSCAREERCONTACT USENGLISH 
OurServices
Repackaging of medicinal products

High quality and speed are the benchmarks we apply in our repackaging process. We perform a complete re-boxing of medical products in one place - there's no need to order packaging materials and conduct repackaging in different places.

Purchasing

Actiofarma has developed numerous partnerships with pharmaceutical suppliers across the European Economic Area (EEA). Our consistent procurement delivers to both hospitals and pharmacies, including cold-chain items, narcotics, originator drugs and generics.

Pharmaceutical printing house

We produce all re-boxing package materials for parallel trade in a single printhouse. Our facility offers an extensive selection of label and box sizes, ensuring the availability of suitable options. The printhouse holds an ISO 9001 certification, signifying its commitment to quality.

Logistics

We offer transportation services for small temperature-controlled parcels along our established routes. This presents a cost-effective delivery solution. Furthermore, we are equipped to manage dedicated, larger orders within Europe. Our logistics department has exceptional offerings for deliveries to and from the Baltics and Scandinavia.

IT services

Prescription medicine packaging must meet the guidelines set by the Falsified Medicines Directive (FMD). This includes the assignment of randomized serial numbers to each package - the process known as serialization and we offer a cost-effective solution for this.

Innovative solutions for pharmaceutical business
ABOUT US

Actiofarma purchases and supplies pharmaceuticals within the whole EU. In just the year 2019 our trucks, collecting and delivering goods, drove 715 000 km which is more than 17 times around the Earth. Actiofarma’s broad portfolio is based on collaboration with more than 300 certified suppliers and customers.

Why Choose Us
Sustainable Business Model

We work with one of the largest paper manufacturer and corrugated board producer who maintains Forest Stewardship Council® (FSC®) and chain of custody (CoC) certification. We use and promote recycled corrugated material to help create a sustainable model of business.

Our basic raw material (paper) are sourced from responsibly managed companies and the printing inks used in our corrugated packaging are water and vegetable based to comply with various eco-friendly packaging regulations.

We believe that sustainability isn’t just about taking care of the biological environment but our social environment as well. Aspen Packaging is actively involved in promoting the sustainable health and well-being of our community.

name: Canadian Custom Packaging & The Color Group

extractedData.textData:
Canadian Custom Packaging

Canadian Custom Packaging & The Color Group is a contract manufacturer of topical over-the-counter drugs, natural health products (NHP), color cosmetics and health & beauty products.

Since the inception of Canadian Custom Packaging in 1957, the company has formulated, manufactured, and packaged thousands of products for a diverse customer base, including our healthcare company Jedmon Products. In 2007, CCP acquired The Color Group, a contract manufacturing company specializing in color cosmetics.

Focused on custom manufacturing, Canadian Custom Packaging & The Color Group provides our customers with the opportunity to develop unique products.

​

We make your product for you, in Canada. Canadian Custom Packaging & The Color Group offers a variety of services for your convenience: Research and Development, Materials and Sourcing, Manufacturing, Labeling, Filling, Quality Assurance and Warehousing. With the valuable benefit of being able to say: Made in Canada.

Copyright © 2017 Canadian Custom Packaging & The Color Group. All rights reserved.

Why co-pack with WG?

Familiar with the challenges of variety packs, specialty packs, product filling and displays? Ineffective.
Time-consuming. Complicated. We get it.

Your brand has undoubtedly crafted a product that consumers crave. However, it’s essential to address the capacity of your production area. While your production operates tirelessly, the current workforce might not be sufficient to handle box setup, packing, sealing and truck loading efficiently. This limitation could potentially impact productivity and overall operations.

But here's the difference:
With over 30 years of experience working with big brands as well as startups, we’ve pioneered solutions in the marketplace. Now, with the integration of robotics into our co-packing process, we address the pressing challenges of labor scarcity and cost reduction head-on.

Entrust us with your bulk product, packaging, and finished format specs, and we’ll handle all the assembly and preparation in our warehouse. No need to adjust your staffing size, halt production lines, or rearrange warehouse space. Instead, stay focused on your core strengths while we execute your marketing or production plans seamlessly.

Let’s collaborate to deliver simply exceptional products together.

Unmatched production capability 

Co-packing has two very distinct perspectives: marketing and logistics.
In terms of marketing, it enables increased visibility of products through seasonal packaging, promotional sets, multipacks, or by featuring a main product with a sample included.

In the dynamic world of commerce, having a specialized co-packer on your side can be a game-changer.

Meet WG, your strategic ally in the pursuit of success. Instead of pouring resources into physical expansion, trust us to be the driving force behind your competitive edge.
Consider us as an indispensable extension of your business—a dynamic partner dedicated to swiftly launching your products into the market.

At WG, we thrive on the thrill of meeting demands and embracing change. Why? Because we boast the prowess, proficiency, and operational finesse to not just meet but exceed your expectations

OUR HISTORY

Since our inception in 1993, we embarked on our co-packing journey within a modest 9,000 square-foot facility.

Originally focused on managing reclaimed and returned products for a prominent pharmaceutical company specializing in foot and skin care, WG has transformed over three decades. Today, we stand as a cutting-edge operation, boasting facilities in the Greater Toronto Area (GTA), Lethbridge,Alberta. Expertly managing a diverse array of products spanning various industries on a global scale.

REVOLUTIONIZING PACKAGING
Ecofriendly Packaging Solutions for Tomorrow
Taking Biodegradable to the next level… Introducing Omnidegradable® Flexible Packaging
Learn More About Us
Sustainable

Designed to degrade with no harmful remnants, ensuring a cleaner planet.

Efficient

Our innovative materials break down quickly and safely, thanks to microbial degradation.

INNOVATIVE TECHNOLOGY
Omnidegradable® The Future of Biodegradable Packaging

At TekPak Solutions, we harness the power of microbes, which are ever present in environments like anaerobic landfills and ocean environments, to initiate the degradation of our packaging materials. Unlike other “ecofriendly” options out there, our Omnidegradable® technology does not require specific conditions such as sunlight, water, or oxygen to biodegrade. This groundbreaking approach ensures that wherever your packaging ends up, it will return to nature by breaking down into water, CO2 or CH4, and organic biomass which is beneficial for plant growth. This provides you with environmentally friendly plastic alternatives for packaging your customer’s will love!

Learn More
Key Features of Omnidegradable® Packaging

Microbial Degradation

Degradation relies solely on ever-present microbes found in anaerobic landfills or ocean environments (validated by third-party independent lab tests).


No External Dependencies

Does not depend on water, heat, sunlight, or oxygen to degrade. It only requires microbes, making it truly versatile in any anaerobic landfill or ocean environment.


Ecofriendly Byproducts

Breaks down into water, CO2 or CH4, and organic biomass, which are all beneficial to plant growth.

More FAQ's
Explore Our Packaging Solutions

	
Custom Packaging

We offer custom biodegradable packaging bags and rollstock to suit your brand while maintaining environmental responsibility. Our custom packaging program allows for personalization of printing, size and materials needed for your product, without compromising on the biodegradable quality of the packaging.

Learn More About Custom Packaging Options

WHO WE ARE

Founded by Harold Wang in 1984, Olaf Packaging, our family business, has remained focussed on fresh food packaging in Western Canada. We work closely with our customers to understand their needs, design their packaging and help optimize their supply chain. Whether it’s clamshells to protect delicate products, flexible packaging for high-speed packing and cost efficiency or controlled atmosphere packaging to double and even triple shelf-life, we have become a trusted partner to our select group of customers. We will always honour the core values my father instilled: trust, loyalty and hard work.

WHAT WE DO

We believe fresh food packaging in Western Canada is too expensive due to many layers of mark-up. We also believe there is not enough choice because the industry is dominated by large players who dictate what is available. We help our customers design customized packaging and then source it at factory-direct pricing. 

 

CLAMSHELLS & TRAYS

These are the perfect packaging for produce and products that require extra protection.

COMPOSTABLES

The need for eco friendly packaging is more important now than ever.

FLEXIBLE PACKAGING

These include pouches, bags, and rollstock. The most versatile packaging around.

CONTROLLED ATMOSPHERE PACKAGING

Double or even triple shelf life with controlled atmosphere packaging.

WHY OLAF

With over 35 years of developing a network of packaging designers and manufacturers, we have compiled the team to get the job done properly and our purchasing power ensures it is also cost-effective. Our process oversees all aspects from design to QC to final delivery. Thus ensuring peace of mind and keeping the project on budget.

85% of shoppers perceive in-store factors (price, packaging, shelf displays) as more influential than out-of-store marketing.

ST. JOHNS PACKAGING

Still controlled by the Leclair family, the company currently operates wholly-owned subsidiaries in Canada, the United States, Mexico, the United Kingdom, China, Vietnam and Australia, employing more than 950 dedicated employees.

Featured Flexible Packaging Machines
Vertical Form Fill Seal Machines

Our cutting-edge vertical form-fill-seal machines efficiently form, fill, and seal flexible bags. These machines can be used for a wide range of products inclusive of solids, liquids & granular products. Our machines are ideal for startups, boasting impressive outputs with a small footprint as well as established businesses aiming to achieve large-scale industrial runs.

View Machines
Stick Pack Machines

Our stick pack machines are an innovative packaging solution for slim and elongated stick-shaped packages. These machines provide versatility and efficiency in handling packaging for convenient, single-serve, portable, and on-the-go products.

View Machines
Sachet Machines

Our advanced sachet machines efficiently produce 3 side seal and 4 side seal bags for a wide range of products. With versatility and high-speed performance, these machines provide effective and reliable packaging solutions for a variety of industries, including food, pharmaceuticals, personal care, and more.

View Machines
Stand Up Pouch Bagging Machines

Stand up pouches have become an increasingly popular and versatile packaging option to meet consumer demands. Our stand up pouch bagging machines offer precise filling & sealing capabilities, making them an excellent solution for industries seeking convenient and attractive packaging options.

View Machines
Spouted Pouch Filler & Capper

Our spouted pouch filler and capper machines are an efficient and reliable solution for various liquids and viscous products, including oils, soaps, beverages, and more. Preformed bags are filled & capped with precision ensuring a quality finished product with every cycle.

 

View Machines
Popsicle Packaging Machines

Our specialized popsicle packaging machines cater to the unique needs of frozen beverage and dessert products. Learn more about the machine’s capabilities in forming, filling, and sealing popsicle packages, ensuring product integrity and ideal shelf appeal.

View Machines

We take pride in our unwavering commitment to meeting your packaging needs with precision and expertise. Our cutting-edge packaging machines are not only reliable but built to last, ensuring longevity and durability in your operations. What sets us apart is our dedication to transparency – our machines are equipped with non-proprietary parts, providing you with the flexibility to maintain and upgrade without hassle. Beyond machines, we offer a comprehensive solution by providing high-quality packing film. This ensures your production runs smoothly with minimal downtime, allowing you to focus on what matters most – the success of your business.

Trust Unified Flex to be your partner in packaging excellence, where innovation meets reliability. Welcome to a world where your packaging needs are not just met but exceeded.

Flexible Packaging Converting

Combining a variety of materials, adhesives, and printing types, Unified Flex provides flexible packaging converting for rollstock film and premade pouches. We help our customers develop flexible packaging solutions for a wide variety of industries with our robust converting capabilities. We offer:

Rollstock Printing
Printed and Non-printed Film & Preformed bags
Laminating
Metallization and Demetallization (for product windows)
Pouch Production and Spout Applications

ONE STOP SHOP

Gone are the days of shopping around at multiple suppliers for your can needs. At Fast Track Packaging, we do it all. From printing your sleeves, to decorating the cans to taking the stress off of customs at the border. 

SEVERAL WAREHOUSES

Our growth is exponential, in 2023 we opened our sixth warehouse in Salt Lake City, Utah to better serve our West Coast customers. With several operational facilities, we are able to better maximize your freight rate and always have cans in inventory.

500 CANS PER MINUTE

Fast is in our name for a reason, we have the capability to run 500 cans a minute with minimal scrap and exceptional quality.

STATE OF THE ART EQUIPMENT

Our Fuji Seal 415 high speed label applicator produces unrivaled levels of shrink quality. We use near form fitted shrink sleeves to eliminate distortion, paired with culinary food grade steam shrink technology that yields a perfect finish. Fast Track’s 20 foot steam lines achieve the shrink quality that your product deserves.

FORWARD THINKING

Innovative. Progressive. Ambitious. Pioneering. Are some of the words that some use to describe us at Fast Track Packaging. The possibilities are endless on what we are willing to achieve.

THIS IS FAST TRACK PACKAGING
Reduce your packaging costs
Our prices for sleeved cans and printed cans are the lowest in North America. We are the preferred North American supplier with Ardagh, allowing us to pass on our savings to you. And right now, every penny counts!
Get your cans faster
Our current timelines are 2-4 weeks for new orders and less than 2 weeks for repeat orders. 6-8 weeks for printed cans. Miscalculated your retail sales and need packaging faster? We will help you out, Fast is in our name.

Who We Are.

Established in 2002, Trademark Packaging is an international leader in the design, development and delivery of packaging solutions. We are a flexible and multi-faceted company.

Custom packaging boxes have become increasingly popular in the food industry. Food packaging boxes are essential for protecting food during transport, and they also play a crucial role in branding and marketing. Using custom packaging boxes can help set your business apart from the competition and create a memorable experience for your customers. Not only do they provide a professional appearance, but they also ensure that your food products are delivered safely and securely.

Trust the Packaging Consultants

No two products are the same, and no two packaging and shipping needs are the same, either. Distinctive Solutions Inc. knows the importance of safe and efficient shipping to the overall effectiveness of your business. Our consultants offer a thorough Packaging Value Analysis (PVA) to assess the total costs of your packaging methods. Through this process, we can help you discover where cost and loss of time is affecting you poorly. By identifying where your packaging practices can improve, we can help you customize your process to increase efficiency and production.

Distinctive Solutions, a  premier packaging company in Toronto offers the finest range of packaging operations to reduce costs while still providing the most value for your customers.

We have thirty years of experience in identifying specific packaging needs for numerous industries. As a leading packaging supplier in Toronto, we will assess and determine the best packaging products and solutions as well as materials to optimize your operational expenses.

About us

Packall Packaging Inc. is a major supplier of flexible packaging to the food industry, with a specialty in meat, cheese, and seafood.

The company always insisted on acquiring quality leading-edge equipment that our employees quickly mastered. When we could not find the quality we insisted on, we built our own or modified it to our specifications. 

Packall is a full-line converter in that we manufacture films from resins. We also print, laminate, slit, and make pouches, all at our facility in Brampton. Packall is a registered ISO and SQF Level 3 company with certifications with FDA, KOSHER, GFTC, and OPALTONE Print System (Please see our certification page). These organizations continuously inspect our operations, and they certify that Packall is in compliance with their requirements for registration. You can be assured that the product it supplies is of the highest quality.

Our Processes Help Protect the Environment

At DJM Packaging, protecting the environment is one of our top priorities. We favour the production of flexible packaging that consumes less energy and emits less greenhouse gases. We use :

​​

Sustainable raw materials that can be recycled or composted

Benzene-free and ketone-free gravure inks

Our polymer-based inks contain no hazardous air pollutants

Machine drying process that does not require chemicals

FOOD PACKAGING DIVISION

Our Food Packaging product line includes a wide selections of foil containers and lids, foil sheets, PVC food films, cutterboxes and hygienic foil and film dispensers. The department is headed by our very own Chef Michael with over 25 years experience in the Food Service industry.

Our Value Added Brands include AIRFLOW® vented stretch film, PRECISIONRAP® ONYX, Onyxpole and XL ergonomic hand wrap systems, PRECISIONRAP® DK bio-assimilation stretch wrap, PANACEAWRAP® metal protection film, and Zerotape ergonomic tape delivery system with RPET tape made from 85% PCR (Post Consumer Recyclate).

North America’s Premier Supplier & Printer Of Flexible Packaging Materials for the Food Industry

Who We Are

Landry Flexible Packaging is a valuable supplier of consistent and sustainable packaging. We are specialized in supplying, printing, and converting flexible packaging. Our products are mostly for the food industry in North America.

Everywhere in Canada and the United States, we provide customers of numerous sizes with flexible products. The relationship we build together is of the most importance to us. We aim to treat you with attention and respect.

Our in-depth understanding of our customers’ needs, their product application requirements and our efficient method to produce top quality printing are what make Landry stand out from our competition

Our Products

Our printed and laminated films are used for sachets, 3-side seals, pillow packs, fin seals, lap seal, stick packs, horizontal flow wraps, vertical flow wrap, liddings, coffee bags and pouches.

Rollstock Packaging
Custom Printed Rollstock
High Quality Products

Cost-Efficient Packaging
Laminated Packaging
They have excellent barrier qualities against deteriorating agents like light, oxygen, and moisture. They also prevent products from losing freshness and aroma.
They have excellent mechanical properties. The materials are strong and protect packaged materials during storage and distribution.
The packaging can be sealed tightly.
The laminated flexible packaging also allow for customization.
Production of the packaging creates fewer greenhouse emissions.
What Our Packaging Offers:

Landry Flexible Packaging offers all benefits from a flexible way to pack.

We will help you decide on the proper film for your products. Paper: NK, BK, BMG, C1S, paper/poly, paper/poly/foil/poly (PPFP), metalized Polyester (MPET)/poly, polyester/poly/foil/poly, paper/poly/metalised polyester (MPET)/poly, paper/poly/metalized oriented polypropylene (MOPP) and oriented polypropylene (OPP). We print on a broad range of protective properties while employing a minimum of material.

As a partner, we obviously think of what you need. Your products will be custom printed. As the market’s food industry evolves, your product will satisfy all your clients. Stay at the top of your position by selling better looking products thanks to our quick and easy way to custom print your packaging. The materials we choose are even convenient for food beverage.

Our flexible and innovative packaging maintains the freshness and allows visibility of the packaged product if you wish. It also extends the shelf life of food products.

For the environment, and your brand identity

Our packaging is easily transported and stored. It creates less commercial waste, fewer emissions and use less energy. It eventually creates less consumer waste that is sent to landfill.

The material we use requires less energy to manufacture and transport, and generates smaller amounts of greenhouse gases in the marketplace.

You can have a concrete and significantly positive sustainable profile.

Personalized Vision

We are committed to realizing your vision. Our professional designers work with customers to understand their brand ethos, target demographic, and specific objectives. Our custom packaging options are made to accurately represent your brand identity and make an unforgettable impact on customers, whether you’re looking for bold colours, elaborate graphics, or specialty finishes.

Unmatched Quality

Quality is the foundation of our unique packaging boxes. We use innovative techniques and premium supplies to ensure the longevity and protection of your items. From corrugated to eco-friendly choices, we provide a variety of materials to help you achieve your sustainability goals without sacrificing quality.

Creative Designs

We provide a wide choice of designs that complement your product line, from elegant and minimalist to vibrant and eye-catching. Your custom packaging will not only meet but surpass consumer expectations thanks to our focus on staying ahead of industry trends.

Frequently Asked Questions
Is corrugated the best material for boxes?

Yes! Corrugated cardboard is lighter and less expensive than alternative materials such as plastic, wood, and metal—plus, it is 100% recyclable. Unlike other types of boxes, corrugated boxes fold flat for storage and shipping, saving you money and floor space.

Can you custom design and manufacture corrugated boxes?

Yes, we offer complete custom design and manufacturing services for corrugated packaging tailored to your product’s exact needs.

What is the typical lead time for ordering corrugated shippers?

Lead times can vary, but we typically require 5-10 business days for standard stock box orders and 2-3 weeks for custom-manufactured boxes.

Do you offer recyclable and environmentally friendly packaging options?

Absolutely. We have many sustainable packaging solutions, including recyclable corrugated and corrugated from recycled content.

What industries do your corrugated packaging solutions serve?

Our corrugated shippers are ideal for countless industries, including food/beverage, retail, manufacturing, automotive, pharmaceuticals, and e-commerce.

Can you handle large-volume orders and provide shipping across Canada?

Yes, we have extensive manufacturing capabilities to handle orders of any size and supply chain solutions to ship corrugated boxes nationwide across Canada.

How do you ensure product protection during shipping with corrugated packaging?

Through customized box design, robust construction, and extensive distribution testing, we engineer corrugated solutions to safely distribute your products.

What separates your corrugated shippers from other packaging suppliers?

Our dedicated focus on sustainable innovation, design expertise, nationwide capabilities, and commitment to premium customer service set us apart.
